lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we get into tonight's episode, we're going to do some quick announcements. First and foremost, we brought tonight our fantastic returning sponsor for campaign 2, our friends at D&D Beyond! Sam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Instead, I decided I'm going to read the copy while they paint my face. That is the bit. Laura and Travis have free reign to paint anything they want on my face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You obviously can't read while I'm painting your face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Say it with me: you did this to yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Laura and Taliesin. How do I look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look about as good a a job as Jester did to Yasha last week.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: He's a snake person!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good job!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I something? Or is it just dicks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's an explosion on the left side of your face. Then you got punched to the right side of your face. It's kind of great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd put it at a natural two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, my natural one must have been real shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks like you got bloody raw meat on your lower--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like it's if Nott was going for a Bowie vibe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How's it smell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Context! The face paint smells like farts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to get sick by the halfway point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beadle and Grimm's, dndbeyond.com/promotions/platinum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam. Thank you, D&D Beyond. Thank you, Matt Lillard and friends at Beadle and Grimm's.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a gorgeous box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not even paying attention. BTS Monday! Marisha Ray!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's so hard at work that she's not even present when we're announcing her show.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's seriously working all the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look forward to that on Monday at 7:00pm Pacific on twitch.tv/criticalrole. You can see the next episode of All Work No Play tomorrow at the same Twitch channel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a special one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one, both Liam and Sam are getting some special character creature makeup just like this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Incorrect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, is that tomorrow? No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. That is incorrect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spoilers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My sheet is incorrectly filled out!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is a spoiler, like a week ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think tomorrow is goat yoga.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll only say one word. Butts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lots of butts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Butts and taints.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lots of butts. Lots of TJ Storm and lots of goat yoga tomorrow here at 7:00pm Pacific on twitch.tv/criticalrole. Check it out then. We are headed overseas next week to MCM London to come meet a bunch of you awesome European Critters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Australian accent) G'day mate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're super excited about it. We'll be there on October 27th and October 28th. For more info, you can got to critrole.com. Last but not least, Laura Bailey is running a very special one-shot next Thursday.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, it's happening!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're pre-recording an episode because at the time that the show happens next Thursday, we're going to be on an airplane going to aforementioned MCM London. We're taking a week off from the main storyline so that Laura Bailey can run her very first one-shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so nervous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like ridiculously nervous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know all the rules and stuff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all you need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's never played.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You can check that out next Thursday, October 25th at this time, 7:00pm Pacific, in place of Critical Role on Geek & Sundry's Twitch, YouTube, and Alpha channels. I think that's the extent of our announcements for tonight. That brings us into the next episode of Critical Role!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yaas, yuan-ti! [TV static, click] [groovy Critical Role theme]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back everybody. Last we left off, The Mighty Nein had found their way south outside of the Empire on the coast of the Menagerie Coast, stolen a pirate ship, apparently. Following a thread to pursue aspects of the mystery of Fjord's background and the relationship to his mysterious patron, followed a mostly charred map to an island known as Urukaxl. Passing the dangerous reefs, you came upon the mother ship to the ship that you had stolen, known as the Squalleater, which was then, you realized, helmed by Captain Avantika, who gave you the option of either working with her under her guise as, essentially, currently captives and maybe eventually crewmen of the ship, or be killed and left in the harbor, held down with rocks and die. You took her up on the offer. You also discovered that she seems to be as enthralled with this same entity as Fjord is and has some sort of similar history with how this serpentine entity known as--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uk'otoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uk'otoa. You remembered. Good job.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Uk'otoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (exclamations)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I get any jump on that Slow spell I tossed out at the last second of the episode? Yeah, I said "I start casting Slow," and you said, "That's where we'll pick up next week."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you will, and that'll be your turn, because literally-- it's not so much a stand-- you just slid down and hit the ground, and you just take a moment to take in the scenario and then now we get to be--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Had to ask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Deep in the single digits over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deep in the single digits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a cleric thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a cleric thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey Max, can I get Ashley's iPad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good call. All righty. 25 to 20?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at you! Did you roll initiative for Yasha?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got strength.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got Yasha's tablet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Max is bringing it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fabulous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 for Fjord. 15 to ten?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 14. Where are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Ten to five?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six. Here comes that Slow spell. Fastball special.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The wind-up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone is prone, by the way. You slid down the stairs on your ass and impacted with the stone floor of this chamber. Nott, what would you like to-- sorry, Beau is-- sorry. Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These are lizard people? Or these are snake people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, these are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These are the yuan-ti.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, these are the yuan-ti. These three individuals that are mostly humanoid, but bits of their skin are scaled, their eyes are yellow, you can see sharpened teeth. This individual here is the one with the large hooded snake head that's still a bit taller than the rest and these long lanky arms. Gray skin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they look super pissed off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look very unhappy that you've stumbled into this chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That's all I need to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just going to say this, as players: last time we encountered a group of people, we killed them all. They hadn't done anything to us. I'm just saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These people obviously skin other people alive, okay? They're bad people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These are Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom villains.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to get up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, kill them all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau comes to her feet, that's half your movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to go for that hooded one if I can. I've got 25. Do I round down, because it's 45 halved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's halved that. Almost all numbers in the game are rounded down, so to 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 20 "foint?" 20 "foint" of "movemoint."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What just happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know if you have enough room, or enough distance, to get over here. You'd have to go over. Either way, you're going to take some attacks of opportunity, so it's up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I'll just go for these two right there in the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You jump onto your feet and leap up onto the top, and you're now pincered from both at different angles. What are you going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I throw a punch. I'm going to see if I can hit the one to my right first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was almost great. 12. Nope, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to punch with my fist. Which is good. Nine.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend a ki point to stun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's nine damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stunning strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a natural 18 plus zero.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bullshit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does make the save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will punch the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 does hit. They're not wearing much in armor. They're here for ceremonial reasons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage to the other one, so both been hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, sure sounded like we were being shamed. "They're not wearing any weapons, they're "just here for ceremonial reasons."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean they're not armored; they have weapons on them. These particular ones, the purebloods you see here, as they are called, are not wearing heavy armor, so they're not too difficult to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend a ki point again and do flurry of blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. You got two more attacks, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'm going to punch each one of them again.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was almost a natural 20. Did you see that? 15. That's good. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage to the one on the left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like those dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The other one was a natural 16. They take another ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! All righty. You went whack, whack! Manage to hit them both repeatedly in a row. All attacks hit. They're both taken aback by the impact, and then spin to you immediately, their tongues out. They're definitely focused on your presence now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Probably should have done Patient Defense, but I'm done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you're done. Yasha's go next.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha's going to pop up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Yasha gets to her feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's there. Does she have half of her speed left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 feet. Can she get up onto the platform opposite of Beau? How much further can she go? Can she get to hooded snake, Cobra Kai?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not right now. That path is blocked, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But she's flanking. She gets advantage on her attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one is she flanking? This one in between Beau and I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, currently.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, with her bonus action she would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes! The rage kicks in, pulls out her Magician's Judge sword and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, with the Magician's Judge, could she make her first of two attacks against that one that she's flanking and could she make them reckless?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly. I mean she's flanked, but she can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, so it's already there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She'll use Divine Fury if it hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for the attack with advantage, because you have her flanked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (music)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12 plus five, 17 on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! Jumps off of the side, and with the momentum she leaps onto the platform. She pulls her sword out, arcs it past the already punched, damaged yuan-ti in front. Reacts, looks over the shoulder towards you as you go for your second attack. Same one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, please. Natural 20. With that barbarian critical! Double the dice. (counting) That's 17 points of damage on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a lot. They were low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the same one, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the second strike-- the first one carves past, it hisses at her, Yasha then spins the sword around and with one giant snap the head (plop) and the body falls off to the side of the ground and crumbles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Easy kill, oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It means they hurt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha winks at Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Rage winks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. (growls)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Yasha's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Head's off that corpse. You can't put it back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot of things. It means that they could actually do damage to us, possibly. They could be glass cannons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right. That's true. We'll find out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're probably about to find out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's thinking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That one uses her turn to cry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (fake crying) My sister!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Triplets down to twins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one is going to look towards you, Beau, and in this soft, pinched voice go, "Why don't you "just go sit down." Make a wisdom saving throw for me as this brief sparkle happens in your eyes. You feel this wave of arcane influence begin to reach out towards your mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You blink it off and smile back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's not chairs. What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think they have a lisp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one is going to, moving off to this end, attempt to pull out a scimitar and aim down to strike at an angle towards Nott who's currently on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just a snake person!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if she was in melee with Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she is. She's within melee.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use that sentinel reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So she gets an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's reckless. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can quit barbarians any time you want.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) 15 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! Yasha's seeing this one slink by and swing with the scimitar down towards Nott, who's trying to scramble away down on the ground. Yasha turns around and slams the blade into the back of her shoulder, forcing her down. However, the scimitar is already arcing down towards Nott, with advantage because you are on the ground. All right, a 15 and a 16. I believe that's a total of 19 to hit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The strike hits you for seven points of slashing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uncanny dodge! So what's that, four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You look like that two year old that got into the face paint. "How do I look, daddy?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mom's really expensive makeup.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I'm a ninja turtle!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your work was far better than mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I was following your lead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slithering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those sounds are just awful. Oh shit, he got some movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30. Over the top down. The legs as they bend seem to give in places they shouldn't, with an unnatural slithery feel to even just the footsteps. It's really creepy to watch it move. As it spins around, it's going to attempt to take a bite and scimitar attack, both on Beau with advantage because it's flanking with its own pureblood. That'll be a 24 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. He knew. He didn't have to ask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell me when the Nein stops screaming, Clarice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bite attack, so you take four points of piercing damage plus nine points of poison damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein. I'll do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As part of its mind fang ability, you're also going to take some psychic damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Psychic also?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (nervous laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Things you never want to hear Matt say

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of psychic damage

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your DM and your doctor. "That's not good."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the hood opens and the giant fangs extend and sink into the back of your shoulder, the poison hits your system and your brain suddenly pulses with a sharpening pain. The psychic energy courses through the entirety of your consciousness. For a second, your vision goes flash white and blurs. You almost fall to one knee as the fangs pull out of the wound. At that moment, it's going to strike with its scimitar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, it gets another? Oh, this guy's really hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 23 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh man. Do some monk shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I should have. I made a wrong call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of slashing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm still alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That's going to end its turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you in the single digits or double?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Double, but barely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Fjord's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, cool, cool, cool. Okay, hot second. Yeah, that changed what I was thinking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, don't do it. Stop it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what? I don't want to get in there. Can I just--? Mm, yeah, boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we ever do any of that poison resist stuff? We fell down the stairs, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) We didn't do it. We didn't have time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what, where I am, I'm going to fire two blasts of Eldritch Blast at it and I'm going to close--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To which one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At Cobra Kai.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what, with my bonus action-- no, just Eldritch Blast. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, good. Ooh, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 still hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right! Oh, it's an eight. 12 points of damage total.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Looking really rough?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. As it pulls back from Beau and swings with its scimitar, the head curves back and stares at you. You can see, against this dark gray, scaly skin, its very dull, yellow-white eyes immediately trace onto you. Is that the end of your turn? Are you going to move or stay where you're at? You have 15 more feet of movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I move along the wall that way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 15, it's as far as you can get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go, Fjord. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screams) Nott will, from prone, fire a shot at-- actually, will load a burning bolt-- I have one left-- and fire it at snake creature, the hooded one. Okay. Ooh, yeah, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely hits. It's sneak attack because it's adjacent to Beau, plus the additional damage from a fire bolt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, yes. (counting) 26. Plus I'll use Fury of the Small, why not? 31. Plus the burning bolt, what does that do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should be on your sheet there. I think it's an additional 1d6 fire damage, if I recall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't write it. Wait, no, it says 1d6 fire damage. Another two points!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Metal!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hisses as the bolt hits it from the back of the head, and you can see where it embedded itself partially into the skull. It comes up at top, and part of the bone's piercing up, and the flames are still burning in the back. It's trying to reach and pull it out of its own head. All right, that's your action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did it shoot through the head and it's still alive?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got that snake hood that's very thin, I assume. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It didn't go all the way through the brain, it just hooks into it. It did some serious damage still.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how hiding works, but I'm going to hide. I know that this thing over here will see me, but can I hide right there, hiding from the vision of that one? Does that work? Can you hide from one person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're still prone. If you want to get up, it's half your movement, or you can crawl at half speed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to crawl over there and hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You crawl over here. You can go there because you're still in melee with that one, but you can attempt to hide from the other if you'd like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to hide.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Prone still means you're disadvantage-- no, they have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's advantage on melee attacks against you, disadvantage on ranged attacks against you. You crawl on the ground around the corner. Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 23, but I think because I'm wearing the hood or whatever--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you always get advantage while you have that cloak on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, still 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Breaking the silence here, Beau, after you've been struck by this terrible psychic pain in your face and the poison courses through your veins, you look before you and the one yuan-ti pureblood in front of you you had already damaged is (snarling), and it's pulling this crooked dagger out of this sheath from the side. Suddenly, in a flash out of nowhere behind, you see blades go (wooshing) and you watch as Avantika, who was previously invisible still from the spell, appears as she does three main strikes from behind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! I did my math wrong.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As soon as you attack, it drops your invisibility, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screeches) Falls to the ground. Avantika is there in front of you and flicks both blades off. Some of the blood (splashing) across the stone on the ground. "Don't worry, I've got you," and is going to use movement to move up this way. Actually, she doesn't have enough movement to do that. She can be right there and gets one more space there. That ends Avantika's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not that it matters; fury of the small is six points of damage, so it would have been 34 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One more point. Thank you for the clarification on your math there, Sam. Jamedi's going to get up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mom's Jamedi.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First opportunity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi's going to start taking the bow and huffing and running around the way to hide behind this pillar. Coming that way, is going to attempt to fire a short bow at the one that's right next to Yasha. Natural 19, very nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so excited to find out when he will turn on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is six points of damage to that yuan-ti, and is going then continue to move-- actually, no, at that point he couldn't quite get that far. He would have been right there. Trying to move behind, but because he had to get up from prone, lost half of his movement. That ends his go. That brings us to Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to stand up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you stand up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to cast Hold Person on the gray guy with the cobra head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the gray guy? Okay, you release the spell, and it has no effect. It seems that the snakelike form that this creature has mutated into has gotten so far out of the realm of humanity to no longer be considered a person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold Monster? Hold Creature?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I need Hold Monster. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my action. I don't have any spells for bonus action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Starting to feel less terrible about killing them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I say: Well shit! That's my move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (hisses) towards you, its fangs bared. That ends your go, Jester. Caleb and Caduceus, you guys are up at the same time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was rummaging in my pockets for the molasses, but everybody is dropping, so instead I pull out a burned twig and hold my hand out and cast Witch Bolt at 3rd-level through the twig towards snakeman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh! All righty. Roll for attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that's 3d12, which I have never used in my life. I think it's this one. The fuck is that?! That's an 11. Plus six is 17. 25 lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which I did from the ground, I guess, so I will stand up now. Am I within five feet of that guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, I'm going to run for it. I'm going to go toward that pillar there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 25. As you rush by, its snake head cranes around and extends out to bite towards the side of your shoulder and arm as you rush past.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, Caleb, no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I able to use Shield as a reaction if I've already cast a spell? No, correct? Because I've not tried to do that, so I don't know if it's allowed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it's during your turn, I believe you cannot because you only cast one spell--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Per round? Because as a rogue, you could do sneak attack damage and then on an attack of opportunity, you could do sneak attack damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's different from combat spells versus casting spells during one turn. I'll have to go back and look at that specifically. But for the time being, no, because there's the one spell per round limitation during your turn, at least. That is going to be all together a 17 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is six points of piercing damage, plus seven points of poison damage. It's going to use its secondary mind fangs this round. Similar to Beau, your brain suddenly gets spiked with this burst of terrible wracking pain that emanates into every memory of your past life. Like your existence in one instant is just set on fire and pulled away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do not get close. If you can help it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's not too bad! That's 13 points of psychic damage to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh! That's not too bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you're a wee man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's half-speed. That ends your turn. Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stand up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'll stand up. I'm going to back into the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There? You back in towards this cluster of weird, mossy plant matter that's on the edge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to just-- No, I'm not going to bother with that for now. It's not really going to-- If you go down, you go down at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (scoffs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No healing I'm going to do is going to keep you from going down if you get hit by a triple. I can just get you back up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but it could prevent-- Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus. What are you doing, buddy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (conflicted stuttering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a lost cause, basically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do a-- Where'd it go? These are cantrips. Healing Word on Beau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! You guilted him into healing you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean. Eight points of healing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh! That's good! Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go; take your eight points of healing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold the Channel Divinity: Path to the Grave spell for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends Caduceus' turn. Beau, you're up. Yasha's go is when you release?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Right as Yasha starts to move, I'm going to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll find out, won't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't know. It's going to make Yasha boss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to turn around to Cobra Kai. I want to be like: (slurring) That was mean. Because I'm still very sick and now I'm poisoned. Then I'm just going to start fucking blind rage, in my slight hallucinatory haze, whaling on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Her. He. Monster. That first one was 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beautiful. Okay, that's eight damage, and I want to try Stunning Strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stunning Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stunning Strike on this one? That is a 14 plus one: 15. What's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Resists it, unfortunately. There's a (impact) as you hit. You realize as you're trying to do Stunning Strike, you don't fully understand the physicality of it. Its body and organ placement is different from the usual, other human-type creatures you've studied, and so you're just unable to hit the right point in its body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Hit it again. That was such bullshit. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In your confusion and frustration of not being able to find the soft spot in its body, your second strike goes and it manages to dodge out of the way. No impact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just look at it and I just go: I don't feel very good. Then I'm going to do Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so then you go in Patient Defense to protect yourself. Got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a little nauseous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is now Yasha's turn. Before Yasha can begin the round, Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Channel Divinity on the angry snake in armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the next hit against it, it has vulnerability.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. All right--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll find out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's Yasha doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's turning around and head-butting the woman. No, I'm just kidding! Yeah. I'll hop off the platform and run towards snake in armor, right? The one you cast on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Yasha darts off, the pureblood behind manages to swipe out with the scimitar. Has an attack of opportunity against her. That is going to be a natural-- They're rolling really good! 17 plus three. 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, Yasha suffers seven-- six on the d6. Seven points of slashing damage, reduced to three because she's raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then Yasha shrugs off the impact, rushes towards the large gray snake entity, and?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that definitely hits. That's a 22?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is correct. Go ahead and roll damage on that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 11-- 16 points of damage on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 16 points of damage. It is vulnerable against that. That is technically 32 points of damage from that strike. How does Yasha want to do this?

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn! That's fucking awesome. Yasha goes: Don't touch her. And just shoves the sword in, and then slowly lifts up the snake, just bringing it up through its ribcage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pay attention, guys!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. As the blade carves through the stomach of the gray snake man and is lifted off the ground (hissing). It begins to curse in Abyssal as the blade begins to carve up its body, until eventually, its hissing turns into a low gurgle, and then it just slides off the blade, the parted half of it splitting into two sides onto the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did all Caleb hear with Comprehend Languages is swear words?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Yasha and I just go: That was very (vomiting) and I puke a little bit on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Sexy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hot. I needed that today, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then try and dash--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's also a ramp, isn't that harder terrain to get up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no. That's true. Given that circumstance, there's not much of an escape route for this one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (cartoon running sound effects)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is going to, instead, leap down and attempt to assail Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm hiding!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not against that one, you're not. All right, so attacks twice with the scimitar. Ooh, natural 20 on that one and a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Denied.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Denied?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because when you hold your action, you use your reaction to release it, so you don't have a reaction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It uses a reaction for that? That's bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, buddy. That's a natural 20 on one scimitar hit, and a 19 on the other to hit. The first one, that's eight plus one. Nine points of slashing damage on the first hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. I'll take that whatever it's called.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Uncanny Dodge?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's four slashing damage, and the second one is going to be-- Ooh, that's not good. Two points of slashing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so that's six total points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now with all of its allies fallen around and seeing everyone else standing up, its eyes are darting around, looking like it's a caged animal (snarling and hissing). Its scimitar in front of it, it's swinging it wildly in the air and pointing it towards anything that comes near. That's going to end their turn, Fjord, you're up next.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord rushes up, summons the blade, and points it at her, summoning a little eldritch energy in his off hand, and says: Drop it. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glaring at you doing that (hostile snarl).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't seem to be fazed, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, no! That's Yasha's, that's plus two! This is plus seven! So (counting) 18!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stupid double iPads, fuck! That seems low for charisma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was surprised, I was like: Okay. That brings us effectively out of combat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slide that a little bit down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you all take stock of your surroundings. The one standing yuan-ti, the bowls they were holding and pouring into this fountain clattered to the ground, the one stands there before you with your blade held towards their neck as they're (snarling).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You understand anything coming out of this thing's mouth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's this one thinking? You do that, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very curious to see how this is going to go. I just want to look her over. What is this room? What is happening? What was going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that would be more generally looking around you guys. In this chamber, based on the little bit of travel you've done from the very top of this temple, this is the top chamber in the pyramid. You're about partway down from where it is on the surface. It continues down, you imagine, based on how large it is in size. This is the highest part of the pyramid so far. Within this chamber, there are clusters of these bits of mossy plant life that's growing in elements of the corners. There is a fountain that sits atop the central platform in the center of the chamber. The water itself is slowly trickling off the sides in small little grooves; it looks to be brackish and green. The staircase-- a few minutes pass-- revert to stairs, so ascension is possible. That's the most of what you can make out in the chamber. The pillars appear to be more load-bearing and designed-- as you get a closer look, make a perception check on this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting point. The stonework and the construct of this entire temple is very old and very simple, but you see a lot of intricate carvings and additional stone that's been added to the interior of the chamber that is all carved to represent snake creatures surmounting, and a great snake god. Make a religion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my gosh. All kinds of checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of the iconography in this chamber is directly based on Zehir, the Cloaked Serpent, and is imbuing their power into the snake followers and giving them mutations. You can see people going into this metamorphosis and transforming into a number of the larger snake entities you fought or have seen in the city below. But all that carving is newer. It's fresher. It's been placed to cover the older stone of the temple, and you get the sense that this temple was not constructed by these yuan-ti, but has been since co-opted by them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Priestess of Zehir, what was this place before you found it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking you over, "It was--" she's speaking in Common now. "It was built to a false idol."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you know its name, or are you afraid of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eyes turn towards you, looking up at your large, goofy grin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As I'm large, goofy grin, I'm going to start touching one of the other priestesses and I'm going to start the process.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a sponge emerging from it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't mind that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She turns to you and goes, "Are you to let me live?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that all depends on your cooperation. We're trying to find our way further below. You can either help expedite that or complicate that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Mine, my stats. Woo! 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks towards you, looks towards Caduceus. Goes, "I will not sully myself before "the eyes of my god." In a flash, pulls a dagger from inside the sash attached to the side and-- spray, cuts her own throat, scattering across the front of you, Caduceus, before the body plummets back onto the ground with a sick thud on the stonework and then bleeds out, a small grin pulling across her sharpened teeth before her eyes roll back and she expires.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cure Wounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Can you do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, can I? Or is it too--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a dexterity check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fair. All right, I was wondering if I was pushing this too far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cure her before she dies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The moment of shock hits you, having not encountered someone take their life right in front of your eyes, and that brief moment of pause is enough that when you go to try and collect your thoughts and cast the spell, the spirit's already left the body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I obviously do cast the spell, don't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say you go to cast the spell--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I start?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to, and then realize they've already expired.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's cheating.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They take it pretty seriously around here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think a lot of gods make people kill themselves?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they gone yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doesn't seem very helpful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, I was here the whole time!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start poking around some of this. Is this attached to the walls?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait a moment. Nott, have a look around this room. Do you see anything problematic?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good idea! I'll go check the fountain. What are these big fancy-- are these doors on the sides?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those are some of the inscripted carvings that were placed over the existing stonework of the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to search the body of the beast guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an investigation check as you're searching the fountain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The liquid looks grimy and cloudy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hate water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice there are, on four edges of the bottom basin at the lip of the water-- and the water meets the very edge-- there are slight grooves where the water's slowly trickling out and down to the floor, and where it hits the floor there is no pool of water. You inspect closer, and there is a hole beneath each groove where the water itself is pouring through the floor below you to what you assume to be a chamber below.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This shit opens up!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. Is there anything arcane in nature to the writing on the sides of it, or can I ascertain the purpose of it? This fountain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check to see if you can ascertain any arcane nature to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While all this is happening, I'm going to go over to one of those moss clusters and just cuddle up with it and sleep. And take a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all taking a short rest?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. While you guys are doing this I'm going to be like: Guys, they have pillows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to talk to the moss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to ask the moss to make sure you have a very comfy sleep, do what they can. You guys take care of that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Beau feeling okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, Beau is definitely not feeling okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you do notice the corner where the moss is, as you cuddle up to it and glance forward, there is a six-inch or so diameter hole in the corner of the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a big glory hole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's all kinds of people in this world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goristro need a way out, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tune into All Work, No Play this Friday!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where the moss is growing, there is a hole in the stone chamber about that big around that looks to be a tunnel or tube that slowly descends downward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trash chute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upon glancing at it, the interior is somewhat damp with condensation and that's where a lot of this moss is gathering around the outskirts of it. You also notice scales, little clusters of scales that are gathered on the edges of the stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, snakes come in and out of here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Directly above the fountain there's a ceiling, I take it, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I find anything on that snake guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance up on the ceiling and you can see two grooves-- well, not two grooves, but two holes that are in the stonework above. Bits of the stone have fallen and cracked a little. Where those two holes are, glancing directly below them looking up, you can see the faint pinhole bits of light from the sky above. You also see the stone right around those holes is faintly stained crimson.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Directly above the fountain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was the sacrifice tablet on top.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's why it's all grimy. It's blood water. Ugh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there sign of blood in or around the fountain or in any of the grooves? I'm seeing if the blood makes it all the way down here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your experience with blood and the viscosity of it, you gather that if any of it were to find its way into the fountain, either it's not human crimson color enough. You don't see any signs of it currently in here. Most of the water that's in this fountain right now seems to be just water and algae and grime that has built up within the fountain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it look like those vacuous eye holes in the snakes are about the same size as those rubies that I had found?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Approximately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --look for traps? Can I just look for traps around the fountain without touching the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I search the cobra head?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You inspect the body of the now slaughtered cobra figure. It is nude. There's no clothing on it; it is a scaled flesh body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, I thought it had armor on it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no armor, it is just a lanky, heavily scale-armored snake creature. There's nothing to pull off of its body, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Try to get some of the poison off its fangs because it's poisonous!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, in a vial.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, don't you like doing things with chemicals?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I can, but that seems like more of a medical thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to get the poison off of it. Off the fangs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do you have the materials to do so?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a vial.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have a medical kit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have you ever milked a dead snake for its venom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I haven't milked this kind of-- no, I haven't milked a snake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you'll spend the next 15 or 20 minutes or so attempting to do this and I'll come to you in a minute with your success and/or failure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anywhere where there's moss, am I finding these matching holes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go around finding each of these patches? Yes, there are. At each corner of the chamber there are these patches, and at each corner you do see one of these holes. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ugh. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you can tell is that you do see the errant scale. They're big scales, they're not tiny. You see bits of snake skin and larger chunks of scales that have rubbed off from something moving through that chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said six inches in diameter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, from side to side diameter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I meant. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm thinking about plugging these holes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That'd be smart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What holes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it echo?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't do that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, through the hole? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's all fucking sick and fucked up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, hoo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does echo slightly down and you hear it reverberate. It does continue downward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you doing over there? I walk over and I nudge her thigh and butt with my foot. What are you doing shouting in holes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I found a sing-songy tube.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think that is what that is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, what were you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was looking for traps, I don't think I found it with an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With an 11, it does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the wall where the carvings look like they've carved over something, are there any areas that aren't done as carefully and you can see what was there before it was carved over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever stone has been placed has been cemented in with all sorts of adhesive and basic masonry materials. It was designed to permanently cover what was there previously.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many points down are you right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A lot, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Most of them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, most of them. I have 20 hit points total right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can both use--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I resting long enough where I can put on a few hit points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you guys want to take a short rest, you can do it. At the moment, it does not appear that there's any immediate danger. The door locked above you and you don't hear any more scuffling from above.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nobody noticed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb is way worse than her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, 11.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's take a short rest, for sure, that's what that means.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we plugging up the holes first or are we just watching them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a simple thing, if we have any kind of wood or maybe some silver or copper coins to shove in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, these big giant pieces of wood that we carry around with us all the time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like arrow and crossbow bolts and things like that, use your noggin. Or some coins and I could turn them to stone and block up the holes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Coins, though? We would make them--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Copper?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, what can you turn into stone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's excellent! He can make one thing into another. We used to have this trick where we would sell people a magical box that could turn a copper into a silver.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You motherfucker, that was me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh. Did we use that one on you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we get the weapons off the priestesses and put them in the holes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not a bad idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then you could do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would be stone swords I would imagine, I don't know. We could shove as many--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would keep them from coming up through it as long as it was blocking, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you talking about the holes in the corner? They are about that big around, just so you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so we could shove a sword in there, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you could put a sword in there. It would be sitting on the ground and blocking the space a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was thinking of jamming it full of a material so it's like a clot and then turning that into stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could do that with-- we have-- it's a little morose, but we've got some dead people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't do that to dead people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we just shove the dead people in there, and then if we see the dead people moving we'll all draw our weapons and attack whatever comes out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so fucked up. I'm into it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take some legs and arms and just shove them in the holes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're taking the corpses and filling--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, that's not a bad idea because I could burn the flesh and it would fuse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to chop-- Yasha, chop off all their arms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Yasha) No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester, chop off all their arms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, how about I just drag the bodies over. I start dragging the body over and shoving an arm in the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pushing them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To which one, one of the purebloods?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you're dragging it over, you do see a bit of metal jewelry fall out from underneath the robe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yoink!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is an intricate stone key that is on a metal chain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should get these of the other ladies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's definitely check those bodies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We check the other bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can take it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not bad. I think I made one this campaign. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find two jeweled daggers, ceremonial, that they had kept sheathed or one of them had brought out earlier. That's what you find on their bodies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The gold ring have any sort of symbol on it? Symbol of the snake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of these blades have very simple, snake-like iconography. Where the pommel is, it looks like the snout of a snake mouth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The ring have anything on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ring? No, the ring is a simple gold ring.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should put it in the fire and see if it shows words.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll flip the gold ring over towards Caleb. I don't know if that does anything, but it was on the lady.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I could definitely inspect this. Do you want me to do that now, though, or maybe we are pressed for time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're taking a short rest, remember?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're hanging here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much time do we have left?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I'm pretty beat up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, for you it's taken the full hour. If everyone's taking a short rest, it's a full hour of rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that you can heal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I spent four hit dice, I'm up to 42 points. Does my malaria that I've come down with change?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long has it been for you, eh?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long has it been for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Since you've been called."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Oh! Are people listening or are we by ourselves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, for this purpose, you guys are out of earshot of most of the group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, that night after our convo, I had another dream.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then it was destiny. What happened? Tell me everything."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I found myself under the ocean and then I saw these visions of people that I knew in my life: some that had wronged me, some that were very dear to me. I had to force my way through them up this staircase and when I reached the top-- Have you ever heard the word "reward"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am familiar with this promise, aye."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was astounding. Incredible. Hard to believe. It was almost as if the oceans obeyed my commands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing at her expression, she's enthralled and there's a moment where her head turns and you see a flash of jealousy in her eyes, and then it reverts back and she goes, "That sounds incredible."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long has it been for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A few years, about."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you know, beginner's luck, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently." Her eyes are still locked on yours and she leans forward and takes her fingers and puts them through the side of your hair and goes, "I can trust you, right?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you trust these people?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Good." She puts her fingers the rest of the way through your hair, through the back of your head, pulls you close and headbutts you a little bit and lets you go, and gets up and walks off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) You're a dead man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) Seven days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anybody looking at us as I turn around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (pained) Ah, ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your short rest comes to a close. You've used your hit dice, you've healed up a bit, you've gotten your arcane--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Arcane recovery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. What would you guys like to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would love to take a last look at the snake iconography and the bits that have been added to see how well-- I don't want to fudge them or anything, but where's there a keyhole? Are these things attached to the wall? What's the deal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, it would be. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been that way across most of the walls here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want me to try to pull it away?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm worried about what that might do. I don't know. This is obviously an older temple than they're giving it credit for, which means there's probably things here that are older than snakes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Cad, you know ghosts, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deep down inside, don't ghosts get mad when you build temples on top of their temples?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I've never tried.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like graves on top of graves. Doesn't that make--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's actually very efficient. It's a great way of using if you have a limited amount of space. Over time, you eventually end up doing that. That's common practice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My parents fucking lied to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, apparently they do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (trilling) I'm still echoing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're shouting into a dead body stuffed into a hole?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dead armpit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we understand any of these glyphs? Is there anything that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have looked all around the fountain and I'm not able to make anything out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's mostly visuals of Zehir the Cloaked Serpent, bestowing the blessing and mutating followers that are rising up. His army of snake people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they any seams or visible machinery or cogs or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those are the only things that you've noticed around the fountain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think we want the water to go into the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try looking at Beau? Check her out and see if I can see what's wrong with her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe she's thirsty. Give her some water from the fountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at you, Mrs. Medicine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. Looking her over, you can see the dark circles under the eyes, the continuous sweating along the brow and the shoulders and the chest area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, you're like The Gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pupils are slightly dilated and the breathing is more shallow than normal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your breathing is more shallow than normal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have a whole bunch of book experience with disease necessarily, but you get the sense that this might have been transmitted by some of the insects that you encountered on the island on your way in. It's some sort of disease transmitted by them through bites.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Lesser Restoration says it can cure one disease, but it's not that kind of disease?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I already tried and it didn't happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it's a magic disease.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or it's just mean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe she's got two diseases.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe Matt forgot the quality of Lesser Restoration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. It says condition be blinded, deafened, paralyzed or poisoned, and then above it says diseased, and I did not read that part earlier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just suck as a healer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As part of my own mistake here, we'll say that this is where you come through with your casting of Lesser Restoration before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a time release capsule.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Exactly. It takes a while for it to work its way through the system.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you take it with food or did you just put it in your system?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take it with booze.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you eat it or did you put it up your butt, because it depends.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the fastest way. Up your butt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I get for fast reading. Going, "Oh well, it doesn't list that among the "conditions" but disease is not a condition. That's my fault.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we're mounting up or getting ready to do something, I'm going to go over to Jamedi Cosko and just say: Hey, Jamedi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's sitting there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that was a tough battle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's inspecting the side of the walls and the carvings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oof, I need a drink. Do you want one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am okay, but I appreciate the offer."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You do drink liquids, don't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do on occasion, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, why wouldn't you want a nice little nip of something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns back towards you with a curious glance and says--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sober."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have some jerky. Do you want a little nibble? You do eat food, don't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes narrow. "Yes, I would love some jerky."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Coveted jerky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it from you. "I appreciate the offer." He eats and continues to look over--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he swallowing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little swallow. Chew chew chew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Chewsy chews.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Chewsing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take the tip of one of my paintbrushes and stick it in the holes in the ground and swirl it around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not a zombie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You take your paintbrush and as you put it in there-- because there is the groove on the side of the fountain and it meets with the hole in the ground, so the water is going through the hole below. You stick your paintbrush in it and it mixes with the paintbrush. It's thicker than water, barely. It's faintly viscous and where the groove is you can see the greenish slick where slime and general algae buildup has caused it to discolor against the rest of the stone. It builds up a bit and you pull the paintbrush out and it continues down into the chamber below.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very nice paintbrush.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, look at the weird algae shit on my paintbrush now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't look weird. It's just algae, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It smells like a typical type of algae, though the liquid itself has a somewhat acrid smell to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb looks around at everyone doing absolutely nothing and sits down, pulls out his book, and starts to Identify this ring to see if anything's happening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does this seem like the stuff that's in these people? I've seen several heads come off and I've got samples of it available to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the blood of the yuan-ti that you've seen as it scatters is a deep purple in color.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Including the crazy dude? The one that was super--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this is not that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I get any poison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, that's right. You did not, unfortunately. As you try and sit there holding the head over a jar and jamming the fang into the thing, this awkward process, you don't get much out of it, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we're looking for a keyhole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll search for a keyhole while we're at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should stick the rubies in those eyeballs!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say you do recall as when you entered the temple, now that you're thinking about it, that the door that locked behind you above you, the trap door, it had a small opening where a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's how we get out. Good to know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it's a skeleton key.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five more minutes, please!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You complete your ritual. The ring is not magical, but it is worth a fair amount of gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's assume that bad things are going to come out of these holes at some point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I swirl my paintbrush in the water in the fountain and see if it does anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You swirl the paintbrush in the fountain for a bit. It collects some of the brackish liquid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have thoughts. I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't trigger anything, at least.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, if I were going to make snake people, I'd put them in a room with snakes and I'd have a way of calling the snakes when it's time to start changing those people into snakes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe the snakes come from the blood sacrifice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe the blood sacrifice is what lets them know it's dinner time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's kind of what I said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but I think they're going to-- yeah, you got it. I think we've got to move this fountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's move the fountain. Put some rubies in some eyeballs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go down the fountain, I'm going to walk past Jamedi again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's turned around. He's still chewing the jerky. He puts his shortbow over his shoulder and gathers his things. He's loaded up with pouches and sacks. He's not designed to be a combatant; he's designed to be a traveler.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hoo boy, it's going to be scary down there. I think what I'm going to do is-- I'm going to take out the snake idol thing and-- I'm going to do a quick prayer to my god. Do you want to pray with me? Do you worship this one, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I am not a religious man, but I appreciate your sense of inclusion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just want you to be part of the team.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) Inclusion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're a tolerant group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So it would seem."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All evidence to the fucking contrary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To a point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a yuan-ti woman hanging by her arm off the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Her fucking arm's in it. Jester is grabbing naked yuan-ti guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe not tolerant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Milking its face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we have a refresher on what Jamedi looks like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi has dark brown skin, smooth bald head, gaunt features. He's wearing light cloth, billowing sleeves, but it's tied with a bracer to each side so it doesn't get in the way of his hands' movement. A few pack and satchels around him. He looks like what you'd imagine a professional dungeoneer would look like, where he has a few things to defend himself, but he's not a combatant by any means. He's very good about getting in and out of places quickly, unseen, and gather as much information as he can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He got to the top of the temple. That was it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'm going to ruby it up. There was two vacant eye holes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were three of them. One of them is missing two eyes, the other is missing one and had another gray rock in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do I know about this god? About this snake god?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you know about Zehir: Zehir is a god that wanders in shadow, is the creator of snakes and serpent kin. It is essentially the evil god of poisons, assassins and darkness. They believe that to keep your acts obfuscated and secret is the greatest means of success. "Strike quickly and "without reason. Blind the target with their own confusion" and "Kill slowly. Agonizingly. Or "worse, make them enjoy it," are some of the tenets of their religion and belief.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's let that inform us as we figure out which of these socket the gems go into.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to put all of them in!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We only have two rubies. Wait, do you have three rubies?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have three-- oh. One was stuck to the back of another one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that makes perfect sense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's how rubies--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Rubies are very sticky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach into the water and place--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to do all three at the same time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He already did it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, well, that's fair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to one at a time using Mage Hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using Mage Hand into the water, it finds its way in. Seems to wedge into and affix. Mage Hand again into a second one.
