On one side, the grime-covered snake that's coiled up there now has two glittering ruby eyes peering out unnaturally versus the rest of its relatively bland dark gray-green body. You take it and place it in the opposing socket. As soon as it slicks into place, you all hear this grinding of stone. The fountain shifts, and begins to slowly spiral down below. As it begins to move downward beneath, it begins to show the about two feet of stone of the floor that you're standing on eventually gives way to the roof of a chamber below you. Lightless, it is pitch black below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're between floors now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still standing on the outside of the fountain looking down in. Only just the outskirts of the fountain went down in this slow spiral. You glance downward. It stops about ten feet below you. It comes to a stop. There's a bit of a ten-foot drop to where the fountain is, and now below where it was standing, there's about two feet of smooth pillar, and then very thin stairs that continue to spiral down. Those of you with darkvision, since there was no light source in here, you can see in pitch black of dim light within 30 feet. The chamber itself goes just beyond that, so you cannot see the floor of the chamber. What you can see: the boughs of stunted trees. The smell hits you as you lean forward: it's a fresh earth and vegetation mixed with a smell of fermentation and rot. It seems that below in this chamber, there is a small orchard of some kind that exists without sunlight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, but maybe it's nurtured by--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Blood and viscous--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit, it only grows by the blood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a blood orange orchard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can do better than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you send some light down there, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could do that. Do we want to do that? What's down there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we throw a little light down there to see if anything tries to bite at it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eh, let me borrow this. Frumpkin flies just down to the fountain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (flittering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to see, if I bamf into Frumpkin, if I can hear anything below.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because he's an owl, and has advantage over hearing. Terrible, both terrible rolls. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Absolutely silent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin's back on your shoulder. Okay. Four globules of light lower down to the fountain and look over the side to see what that lights up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys glance down, these small orbs begin to illuminate the base on the floor. The pillar drops down about 40 feet. The chamber is about 40-foot from floor to ceiling. You have about ten feet before you hit the actual staircase down, but it's a thin staircase. Each step is maybe about seven or so inches wide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's terrifying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, want to do us a favor to make sure our way is safe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, let him keep explaining things first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of them that have fallen begin to just slowly rot away and decompose into the floor of this orchard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love me some rotten fruit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you say how far to the bottom it seemed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 40 feet from where you are. About 30 feet once you hit the stairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll jump down to the platform.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an acrobatics check for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, yeah. A check? 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough to do. Even the slick spots and as it ground its way down smeared some of the algae along the outside, which caused a faint bit of slickness on outside of the pillar. Using that, without an issue, slide, land on the top step. It holds your weight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take a drink. (huffing) I'm going to start going down the steps and feeling my way for traps and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that cocked?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I can't tell what it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's an eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 17 for investigation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For investigation to see if there are any traps on the way down. No traps. It is a simple descent and as soon as you hit the soft floor of the orchard, it's just natural ground around you in the immediate vicinity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any fruits lying around on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, two that are within a foot of where you stand. They're somewhat beginning to ferment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll pick one up and smell it. (sniffing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah-ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. The interior is a bright orange-yellow color. It looks fleshy, like the inside of a mango. It smells sweet, but it has that turning point where it's starting to get a little bit--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I like it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, Nott!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if they eat this fruit and that's how they-- I'm not there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't take it. No, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to lick it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It tastes sweet and tangy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These trees grow in total darkness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not there, either.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just taking a little bite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You nibble a little bit. It tastes pretty good. It's got that tang to it, that iron-y tang aftertaste to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just eat one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Iron-y!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you eat it. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Fjord is nudging at Caleb--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's clear, come on down!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's looking! He's finger flipping!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's checking his Twitter. He's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just fun to fuck with you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In answer to your quiet question, I could take the silver thread out and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I jump down, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could have helped, okay. Everybody's doing things too quickly. That thread will take me ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You catch yourself there, but keep yourself up and begin to descend down the steps and below.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to have Caleb put the silver string at the entrance so we'd know if somebody came in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's ten minutes if we want to take it.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: It's locked and we have the key.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I jump down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Beau, acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jump just down the 40 feet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, to the staircase. It's a ten-foot fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You catch yourself and hold onto the edge, adjust, and then continue down without issue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, 14 is like the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's pretty high, considering.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You two are down, the two of you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're up at the top of the tower?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she jumped already. It's you, Caduceus, and Fjord, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm making an athletics check. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten! Unfortunately, there's not a whole lot of handhold in this area. It's a smooth ten-foot space and as you try to find a handhold to grab onto, you just fall straight down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Feather Fall on him, and me, and him, and Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On how many?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On five people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome. That's slick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Choose up to five falling creatures within range." I guess I push the two of you as I fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say: they're not falling. As soon as he slips in--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see him fall and I shove these two off and I go (casting).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, do you take it? Do you guys--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, I'm looking over the edge like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Caleb sees this happening: shoves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should've known--!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The four of you fall and begin to slowly drift.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- that you had everything under control.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all land gently on the tips of your toes before the rest of your body finds its weight now resting onto the soft floor of the subterranean orchard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was pretty cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to let the trees know that we're here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, about a minute's past since you've eaten that fruit and you start feeling a little tingly on the inside of your body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yummy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tingly how?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it burn when you pee?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His hair's purple, now it's pink, now it's orange, now it's purple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is happening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your eyes are like big black saucers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His pupils are purely dilated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your eyes are normally like tea saucers, but now they're like full plates. Are you all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (giggling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're glancing around, the light orbs that are slowly drifting, they're leaving trails behind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes. You should try some of this fruit, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage because you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you're high as fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man, this is the craziest place we've ever been.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, are you okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do that more. It feels nice, the wind. Do that more. Slower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much have you had from that bottle of yours?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man, I just had one of these fruits, and I think I know everything now. You know, it doesn't matter if Jamedi's alive or dead; we're all going to be dead at some point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think he's clearly messed up. Did you have a fresh fruit or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Jamedi and Avantika have managed to join you below in the chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi he pulls out a torch and lights it up. It's very bright.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone turns slowly to Nott.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like Rocket Raccoon going through the dimensional rifts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's already a merry go round of lights going around Nott's head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the faint orbs are met with the brighter torchlight from Jamedi, it opens up the chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like the sun in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This entire chamber is roughly 70-ish feet by about 50 feet in size. This orchard, these trees are everywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five-sided still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this chamber is four-sided, actually. It seems-- make an intelligence check, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on the shape of the temple as you saw it, the size of the chamber you were just in, and the chamber below, there should be more space on the sides and the front of it. It looks like this is probably a central chamber of this floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's 50 by 70.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see any movement in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, with advantage because you have the torchlight on. Or no, sorry, regular roll. Brain working! It's been a week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's very shitty. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know the last time you had people in here, but we're going to try and pass through. If you want, we'll take some fruit, if you want the fruit to leave the chamber. If not, we'll try and do our best to leave it be. We respect your space here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seems receptive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jamedi, Captain, either of you know anything about these trees, or its fruit that grows in darkness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi looks around. "I did not go this far into the temple. I returned for your aid, so no."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does this look or smell like anything those people eat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is very possible. I didn't spend too much time studying the inner workings of their "day-to-day. I was more focused on surviving." Avantika's looking around, arms crossed, glancing, keeping her hands near her weapons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't see how those things are non-interchangeable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this seem to be a lot of fruit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a massive amount of it, but each tree is in the process, maybe holding about a few dozen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like I got a lemon tree!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does this seem like anything we've seen before anywhere, these trees? This fruit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not massive trees by any means, but the idea of trees like this-- and as you look at it now, the color-- previously, you had just the faint light. Looking across the ground as you look up towards the leaves in these trees, the coloration's not green, necessarily. It's more of a deep purplish brown color to the leaves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Creepy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's our footing like? Stone, roots, wet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, it looks to be soft earth, and where are the roots and various vines that have entwined their way around from other plant life that have been subsisting off of the ecosystem that's built in this space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about entrances and exits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly go check. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, will you come with me, please? Never mind. Beau, will you come with me, please?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your vision is jittery there, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh sure. I'm going to sit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I heard what you said to the trees. Any way to see what runs through these things?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How are you all drinking? What is it that you live off of? How is this possible in here? I'm going to quickly, out of fear, cast Eyes of the Grave one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Glancing about, the same source. The one small blip on your radar: Jamedi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In thinking of those questions, the ground itself is damper around the base of the fountain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Directly below where the fountain was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These are carnivorous. Are the trees the same color as the blood of these creatures upstairs? Is it a similar--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It goes from a brown to a faint purple-ish tint.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they've been feeding these things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, with blood. Definitely with blood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, they're pouring bloody water down here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But why?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, judging by Nott's reaction right now, and we've already seen that these people hunt, so clearly this fruit isn't their main food supply.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They like to get high!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there any signs of animal life in here? Is it any more complex of an ecosystem? I feel like I'm missing something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any signs of animals. You don't see bits of droppings or claw marks or teeth marks on any of the nearby trees at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm assuming it's for rituals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're looking for?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Entrances, exits, stonework, writing. I think you said investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check, because at an immediate glance you don't see. There's no open archway or anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you two begin to make a perimeter, you don't see any doorways. What you do see are on the south wall, the western wall, and the northern wall, there are large stone tablets that are affixed to the wall. Similar to the ones you saw above that have almost mirroring inscriptions of this same vision of Zehir bestowing these mutations upon the followers. On the bottom of each of these tablets there is a hole that's about 12 inches wide and about five or six inches tall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A tablet? A door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no door that you can tell, but you see these large stone tablets that are affixed to the north, western, and south wall. Each of these tablets is about maybe eight feet wide, ten feet tall and the base of it, right before where it meets the floor, there is a little space. A little hole, if you will, that's about 12-14 inches wide and about 4-5 inches tall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it roundy or is it rectangular?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An empty wicker basket that's overturned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any blood in the wicker basket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's for fruit collecting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab Nott and say: Can I pick you up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought I was already picked up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pick Nott up, walk Nott over to one of the tablets. We'll say the north wall and I face Nott towards the tablet and I say: What do you see?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (deep warped voice) What do you see?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gibberish)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As these globes of light are brought over to see it, it's quite beautiful, but before you even see the relief in the wall, there's this extremely bright series of symbols glowing on the stone in front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can see glowing symbols? Sorry, you didn't tell me that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! What, huh?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you see?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I see glowing symbols.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit. But I can't see glowing symbols?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're so fucking bright!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you draw them? What do they say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you can't see them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't see this? You can see me, can't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I walk Nott over to the western wall. What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another set of symbols. Say it! What is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's hold on a second. It's been less than an hour. If I put my hand-- oh wait, no it hasn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, It's been more than an hour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start casting Comprehend Languages again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take Nott over to the southern wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stop this! I can't take any more!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Draw! Draw, Nott, draw!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sobbing) I've seen too much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we have been keeping track of which ones were on which wall?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I went northern, western, southern. That is right, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that's the right order. I don't understand any of this shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, do you want to eat some fruit and look at the--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to draw what I see?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feed me while I'm casting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think maybe you should draw what you see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give me ten minutes. That's on the tablets, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any tracks in the dirt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give her my sketchbook with ink and stuff so she can draw the runes that she sees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see some grooves in the damp dirt, and areas where the soft bits of leaves that are fallen that are pressed down, but the grooves are pushed through pressure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not necessarily bipedal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not necessarily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you were trying to say "by people."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That works, too. Attempting to sketch these over, I'm going to say make an intelligence check with disadvantage, please, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Intelligence check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do what you think is a decent job trying to copy what you see. It takes a little while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That would punch in the ten minutes I need to cast Comprehend, so I will retrace all the steps, and place my hands on that writing to see if it reveals its meaning to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, looking at the spell here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's an interesting question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) You need to eat some fruit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take some time to start painting my skin, and drawing my skin because it feels so good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you're literally peeling up your skin, cool. (scratching)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't do anything, because you cannot see the language. You have to be able to touch it and see it to read it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eat the fruit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (foomph) Lights floating around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You see no language.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to eat the fruit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I didn't know that she sees it because-- Oh, I didn't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're figuring this out now as you go to the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do a lot of reading of spells and not a lot of paying attention, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. As you go to the wall, there's nothing there. You're like, "There's no language there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's how you see it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cut some fruit and stick it on his mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't you have the owl see it and maybe you could see through the owl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Too late, I already put it on his mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or you could just eat that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I help it down a little bit more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this good enough for him to discern?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Too late, he's already getting high!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Caleb eats the fruit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He bought the ticket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have been probably decent enough to get through that message. Over the next minute or so, Caleb, the colors of the lights begin to shift. You guys watch as Caleb begins to slowly move the floating orbs in different patterns. Gets distracted by his own cantrip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (deep and warped) Caleb, how are you feeling?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, I stole this ring from you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, Caleb, Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it echoes in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 16 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, it would be with disadvantage, because of the effect of the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about the interior of the chamber, you look in the directions where Nott was and you can see the three markers, and you see a faint fourth glow from the eastern wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eastern wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's another wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel really good, but I know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell us what the walls say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, wait.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know that I am not in a good position, so somebody come with me to make sure--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, not you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I protect him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pick up Nott by the scruff of her neck and am holding her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's so far!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to sit on unbelievably high alert, and this place is giving me the heebie jeebies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi is holding the torch as a light source for those who need it. Avantika is grinning, watching this whole thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm making my own light source on the staff now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're walking by, Avantika saunters up to you, Fjord, and goes like, "I can certainly "say, this is the most entertaining bunch I've traveled with in some time."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Consummate professionals, that's what we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, of course. We wouldn't be this far if they weren't."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blueberry, come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm coming!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head to the southern wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I always know where north is, so it's one of these ways.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "So it's one of these ways."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can see words.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He cast Comprehend Languages.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that south?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the east.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He said south just now. I thought you said south. East was the one that we hadn't checked out yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You better be writing this shit down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I don't know which way I am going at the moment, so DM, which way does my keen, addled mind tell me the direction I just went. South?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: South.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: South. This one says, "The fountain feeds the garden." Oh, we knew that part. Okay. Let's keep looking at the-- okay, what's this one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go to the next one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one do you go to?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go to the west.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Western one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: West.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Need water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "The garden feeds the warden."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The garden feeds the warden?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The warden sounds like a sentient-- Ooh, I feel good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go to the 'nother one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The 'nother one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I always know which way north is, so let's go east.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: East, south, west, east.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, this is like a chain and if I wasn't high as fuck I would get it. "The sacrifice feeds "the fountain."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's the top thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The garden feeds the warden. The warden feeds the snakes! Let's go to the last wall. "The warden "guards the false serpent."

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: The what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: False serpent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The warden guards the false serpent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So there is a false serpent that lives here and we have yet to meet the warden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika just looks straight to you and goes, "The false serpent."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The old serpent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The false serpent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I imagine they are speaking of the previous owner of this temple.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zehir?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably. Beneath us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why's she looking at you like you know what she's talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are close."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you wish to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wish to know what Avantika just fucking said.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's look for the warden.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She said we're close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are the warden right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're close?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got two wardens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. You guys are the wardens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm the warden?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is what I'm estimating--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys are the wardens!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't feel wardeny.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, I don't think anyone is the warden.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a look--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we have yet to meet the warden.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a strange moment as, Nott-- this cold sensation on your back. You're like, "Oh, "that kind of tickles." It begins to constrict and you guys glance over and one of the vines is curled up around Nott and begins to tighten around it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Get Caleb off the ground!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It feels like there's a vine around me, but I know it's not real.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 15 points of bludgeoning damage and are grappled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck! Yasha runs over--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are restrained.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I lift Caleb off the ground because I'm next to Caleb still.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha runs over to Nott and with the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Yasha goes in, takes two swings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're hurting my ribs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless on el vine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. You hold him up at which point a vine wraps up around your body, Jester. That is a 16 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't hit me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You kick it off and pull away. You can now see this--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am walking around so the vines don't get me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This thick vine that is rising up and it curls around, snake-like in its own right, towards you. Other vines begin to thicken in the area around you and the roots begin to turn the area into hard terrain to walk through. The floor of the forest seems to briefly come alive and you now see these large two thick, entangling vines, one that's wrapped entirely around Nott and constricting her tiny body. The other one trying to wrap its way around Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Her first strike was 21. Second one was 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's nine points of damage on the first one. 12 points of damage on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage on the second one. You can now see as this is happening-- Who wants to take action on this one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do something and I'll say: Caduceus, can you talk to them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're always so convincing except for now! I pummel on the ones-- Jester saved Nott? Or is Nott still--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Nott's still being constricted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's still there. It didn't cut through it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh wow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What didn't cut through?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Carved into and cut elements of it. You can see the vine itself, where it's split open, there's a hardy, thick, light green, tendon-like material beneath. It's a very strong vine. It's wrapped around multiple times around Nott now and it's pulling and trying to squeeze her to death.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I wedge my hand in there to try and give a little bit of breathing room for Nott as I punch the vine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can either attempt to help her escape or you can attempt to punch the vine. The choice is yours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll attempt to help Nott escape.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. This is your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It might be a terrible mistake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. (singing) Don't fuck me, Gil. Fuck me. Almost every time. Nine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine. Unfortunately, it's too strong and as you try and pull the vines away, they just are locked in this death grip around Nott. That ends your action. Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it wet in here or is it dry in here, would you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fairly damp. It's not super moist, but there is a general hint of humidity in the air.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Out of curiosity--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While this is happening, Nott, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am trying to cast Teleport. I do not have Teleport.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm trying it anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just focusing. Action spent willing yourself somewhere else. Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Con save, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. All right. You don't pop a blood vessel in your eye, but it gets close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it worked!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I use Create or Destroy Water to try and dehydrate these vines really badly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can--

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: -- certainly try.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to cast Create or Destroy Water and try and dehydrate as much of the tree and see if that-- While I make my way to some higher ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember, Laura, you do have a weasel around your neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You manage to disperse a lot of the moisture in the air, but you cannot pull it from a creature.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Can't pull it from a creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would know that with the spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would know that? Okay. I'm going to try and-- god, the only thing I can think to do at the moment is just do a Sacred Flame to try and get it to let go while I make my way to higher ground because maybe we need to give it blood. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, what are you doing? You're being held up by Jester right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can tell that things are going very poorly so I reach into my pockets and I pull out a bit of iron dust and I go (blowing) and Jester doubles in size.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh tall Jester!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now giant Jester is holding Caleb over your shoulder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey! Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You get advantage on strength checks and strength saves right now, so you can bust if you're grappled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your go. Caleb casts Enlarge on giant Jester. Fjord, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run over to the basket that was tipped over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I run over and grab it and pick it up and look at it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You grab it and pick it up and look at it. It looks like on the inside it had some elements of remnants of fruit that may have scuffed part of the wicker, but other than that it just looks like a basket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. I'll just fire two blasts of Eldritch Blast at the vine that's holding Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you'll get to that next round because it takes your action to lift up the basket and inspect it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. That ends your turn. Now, the vines. The one that constricts once again to you, Nott. As it's pulling you in, you feel now these thorns emerge from the inside of its constriction and poison bursts into your system. You take--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I get to do an action on that last one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 points of poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 23? Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Your action was lifting Caleb up off the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only you can start a forest fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one will attempt to constrict you again. That is a 14 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you kick it off with your giant foot. The vine pulls itself back up. Now you can go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I walk over to where Nott is? I'm going to cast Spirit Guardians and anything that enters that space has to make a wisdom saving throw or take 3d8 radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wisdom save of 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three and 13. They both fail. Roll 3d6 damage and they both take it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are creatures?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the vines that are attacking you and if I'm close by anything that's attacking me, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're close enough to the vine that is trying to attack you, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 11 points of radiant damage. No, 3d8! Those are 3d6. Hold on. I rolled wrong.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please be more than 18.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's better. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha. What's Yasha doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. Yeah. Yasha would like to fucking ragé and she will take-- to ragé. Take two strikes using Divine Fury while she's raging of radiant damage towards--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless. That's 20 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second one is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Roll damage. Still tearing into that same vine that's holding Nott.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19 points with radiant damage on the end of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Damage on the second strike? 2d6 plus five. Weirdly cocked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 11 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. Hacking through that vine. It's still holding Nott, but it is looking really rough. It's on the edge of keeping itself held together and you can see the parts of where Yasha's carved through and where the radiant energy has blasted it. It's starting to leak this thick, green sap. It's having a hard time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thick, green sap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a plant bleeding. If you've ever seen a plant bleed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a Green Day cover band.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott's still stuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Nott's still stuck. Though the vine around Nott is hurt pretty bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The vine that was holding her was the one that Caleb exploded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to take my staff and where Jester already put in holes, I'm going to (grunting).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. The one that's around Nott or the one that's after Jester?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott. Nott?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that's around Nott or the one that's after Jester?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. The first one is 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh it's staff. Staff magic. Ten!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage. All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack. Not as good. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 misses. You swing the second hit with the staff and as you do, the vine arcs out of the way and it hits air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And bonus attack. Bad. Bad-ish. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 just hits.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bad-ish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bad-esque.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, I also need you to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I'm attacking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now that you've moved in, the vines in the area begin to entangle and move around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to push off of the vines on the ground around you that are trying to entangle and hold your legs to the ground. Jester, I need you to also make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At advantage because of Enlarge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hulk smash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No issue. You just kick out of the vines without problem.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Technically.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Technically-- you suck, vines.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Nott. On the top of your turn, as you are still constricted, you take another 19 points of poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott goes unconscious and you watch the vines closing entirely around her face and torso, just the arm poking out of the side. You can now see as the lighter green skin tone get darker with blood now being pushed towards the outer sides of her limbs. At end of your turn, Nott, I need you to make a death saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success. All right. Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can sometimes influence plants. I'm going to try and get them to stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to attempt to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try to tell the trees to stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What are you saying?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not here for you. Let go and stop this, or I can't be held responsible for what happens to this place. Do not join the cycle of life and death here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I get advantage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trees and vines.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they're mean, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An intimidation check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. No. Wow, that's a terrible roll-- and a terrible roll. Seven. No, no, eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, buddy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay! I'm going to use my bonus to cast Spare the Dying anyway on Nott. You're stabilized.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there you go. You no longer have to roll death saving throws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can still constrict you, but... All right, so that ends your turn. Unfortunately, your cries fall on deaf ears as it appears the hunger that drives these vines overrides the communication you're attempting to spring with them. That opportunity may have worked, but not this time!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Darn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, finishing your go. Now --

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord hasn't gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, Jester and-- well, no, you cast Spirit Guardians this turn, right? Last turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Last turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no idea what turn is what.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, I'm trying to keep in my head here--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the top of this round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you taken two turns since--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She did. She lifted up Caleb the first time, the second time you cast Spirit Guardians. Now we're going to Caleb and Fjord. Fjord, what are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: --there are little pocket unicorns dancing around. I just wanted you to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Dancing and spearing with their little horns.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Return of the fucking unicorns!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because the basket didn't do anything, I'll summon the falchion and I will run towards the vine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll a strength saving throw to see if you can manage to break through the entangling vines to get towards it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not good, though. Oh, good, natural 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel them pull at your shins but you still kick through and you hear them snap as you manage to brush past their grip making your way towards-- which one, the one that has Nott?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the one that has Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make your first attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. As I'm arcing down and I look out the side, is the eye doing anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's present.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool, it's there, good deal. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (posh accent) 23.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, fuck. Five points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This slowly shambling chunk of rooted plant. As you run forward, your blade arcing through the air, you cut through the base of it. The actual vine falls limp and uncurls, Nott's body falling to the ground unconscious. That vine is destroyed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get her off the ground! Get her off the ground! As I spit on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have another attack, and there's the other vine still trying to wrap around Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah, I'll take the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you move up to strike that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, please. Oh, that's not going to do it. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine misses, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes your go. Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is vines on Jester down below, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait, but they should've taken damage on my turn again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct-- on your turn or their turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On their turn again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their turn's coming up. They forgot to keep that up last time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Simple spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Firebolt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bolt. Not ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bolt! Okay. I was like-- All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't have Fireball.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (imitating death scream)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I saw you were going--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (combustion)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks a lot Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to hit, that definitely hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like Independence Day. "They're opening up!" (explosion)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just raving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it's just one, so I was scared to go too big, and I just go (small zap).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should be-- how'd you get a one if it's 2d10?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 2d10?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At level five, you're--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, level five, thank you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn, 2d10?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, now it's three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three damage to it. That ends Caleb's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (panicky drug trip groan)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Now both of them are going to attempt-- the one's dead, the other one fails its save, so go ahead and roll that one.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: --yeah yeah yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ch-ch-ch-ch-check it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Check, check, check, check it out--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 damage, nice. It's going to go ahead and attempt-- it's now moving away from you and moving over towards Fjord. That is going to roll a 17 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is my armor class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hits you. It-- (whiplash) wraps around Fjord, pulls your arms to the side of your body and constricts you! You immediately take nine points of bludgeoning damage, and you are grappled and restrained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes that one's go. That brings us to-- now Avantika kicks in. Avantika pulls out blades and is going to go ahead and attack the one going after you and goes "Hands off "of him!" Hits with both, and then-- natural 20 on the dagger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The magical elven poison flame hurricane dagger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Double d4!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like you got Avantika on your mug.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, kind of. This was me at the live show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika just starts eviscerating this vine with two slaps of the rapier and then one giant dagger strike that carves up the side. Looking pretty hurt! Still holding on, though. That being the case, we're going to be back at the top. That brings us to Yasha, who's next.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha will run, clearly disturbed by Fjord being lifted into the air, and will certainly make two reckless attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She says (flirtily) "Put him down!" (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a little confused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley's going to be real happy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha, you're just so flirty today.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine, nine. It's nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Put that stud muffin down so I can make out with him!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah, it misses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second one's a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, there we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No Divine--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, for the first hit. The first hit that hits gets the Divine Fury.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, kickass. Okay. (counting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You double the dice on that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. So 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 points of damage. As Yasha just carves through, the second strike cutting straight up the side, almost freeing you, it's shredded and still holding on by a thread of its life as it's trying to pull you back to wherever it crawled its way out of, but still standing. That finishes Yasha's go. Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast --

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's barely holding on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to Sacred Flame it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It fails with a four on its wisdom save there. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is radiant damage again! That's five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of damage; how do you want to do this, Jester? (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say "Put him down!" Just like Yasha, I echo Yasha. Then I radiant damage the vine and then I stomp it with my giant feet, and then I also lift Fjord up onto my other shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the giant Jester stomping out the vine on the ground, it's now like-- (splattering) Parts of it are being crushed and turned to pulp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, thanks Jester-- (scared moans)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, little children.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now am I over your shoulder in, like, the baby burping pose, or sitting on your shoulder?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're sitting on my shoulder. Caleb is draped over the shoulder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just need to get Nott to higher ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb is fireman's carry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got to get Nott on --?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To higher ground would be nice. Anywhere where we can see clearly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quickly! Before this runs out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to heal. Heal Nott, heal Nott!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just-- do we know where we're going yet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think down, but I don't know how to get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run over and I pick up Nott and I--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we still being attacked by these things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sarcastically) Happily.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: (vocalizing intro to The Lion King)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi's still holding the torch up to give you a good range of light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around you, you can see where the two clusters of these weird vine creatures were, these assassin-type vines. You see there's just two of them, and glancing about the chamber and giving a good solid look, you don't see any more of that type. It looks like these two were the ones that were rooted here either as protector or had just woven their way down here and became part of the ecosystem. But at the moment, you don't see any other threat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we taking ten minutes, or are we just moving on now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should move now, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, all right then. I'm going to just pull a little energy out of the crystal and I'm going to tap Nott on the forehead and cast Cure Wounds at level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have 30 hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, that's tons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, Enlarge runs out and we crash on top of Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long does it last?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (brief exertion)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both Fjord and Caleb (crash) onto the ground, tumbling onto your sides.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm sorry-- that you weren't protected earlier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm good, thank you for asking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's good to know, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (panting) That... was... amazing. I would do it again in a second. Holy shit. I mean, we used to mess around with chemicals, but nothing like that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he still high? Are you still high? Are either of you still high?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both very much are. You have no idea how long this is going to last.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spiritual unicorns are dancing around you guys as this is going on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (excited laughter) Did you see that?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're like this big!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How is my hand as big as yours now?! It doesn't make any sense!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh. I will turn your hand into gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there's anything that would have been difficult to get to past these two plants. I feel like maybe those are the-- they might be --

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember that there was those--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only other thing you've seen are the central slips, the holes in the bottom of those three tablets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go look more closely at those.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast some-- I'm going to use my light maybe to give everybody a little view.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take a break here, we'll be back here in a short bit to pick up their investigation as to where the next exit point of this chamber may be. In the meantime, guys, we have our giveaway here! We have a fantastic padauk with ebony dust inlay Halloween dice vault. I've not seen this before, it looks awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That one says--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that one says--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your toilet guarded by the hemoglobins.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a hole in the bucket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Knee bone connected to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everybody, and welcome back. Our winner of the fantastic Wyrmwood padauk with ebony dust inlay Halloween dice vault from the Kickstarter is... punypompouspuffball.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trippy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow, that's almost a Matt Mercer callout!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Happy Halloween.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Posthaste? Possibly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Where we left off, Mighty Nein. You began to go and inspect some of these tablets with these gaps beneath the bottom. Which way did you want to go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, the one that was--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How big are the gaps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about 12 to 14 inches wide, and about four to five inches tall. Or on the bottom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: North.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, because north was--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The warden garden.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The warden. Okay, but hang on. Do we want to go in, like, order, and start with the fountain feeds the garden? Sorry, sorry, sorry, "the sacrifice feeds the fountain" at east.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. There is no tablet or hole in the east.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. What about --

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: South?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, south. "Fountain feeds the garden."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Into the south. Who's doing what? Are you looking through it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make a perception check. Are you doing it with a light source below?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I --

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (intoxicated) Absolutely! (huffs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep some distance to see if anything snaps at me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've gotten a little jumpy. Not very good, 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing inside, you see a hatchery of some kind. There's a strong smell of fermentation in there. A majority of the room seems to be a series of clusters of roughly one foot tall eggs. They've all been placed in various edges there, nestled in soft dirt and molding fruit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eggs are always good in D&D.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I get a sense of the sort of animal that would've laid--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the south room, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, this is the south-- fountain feeds the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also see what appears to be a broken humanoid corpse, long decomposed, jammed by one of the clusters.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he wearing manacles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no manacles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, can I figure out being in here, do we have any idea how those portholes, those four portholes up above, would feed into this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can look around you. Go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How healthy does that egg look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there are a number of eggs inside there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're lizard eggs, aren't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look to be somewhat reptilian, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm. How healthy-- oh, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it's hard to tell from this distance. All you see is the eggs and the body there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I assume you're telling us all this, yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, there's some reptile-- large reptile eggs in the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They start about four feet into the room, and the room itself from what you can see down there is enclosed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It appears to be a hatchery of some kind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this-- "The fountain feeds the garden." Maybe this isn't the garden that they were talking about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take a look to see if--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No keyholes, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, these are terrible. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see, in some of the walls about two feet off the ground similar sized holes that are pushed in against where some of the vines and some of the carvings are that curl upward-- you imagine probably meeting with some of the holes above. You get the sense that perhaps something uses these to traverse up and down parts of this temple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could be where, once the eggs hatch, they come up, or this is how they get the eggs down, this is a nesting area. All right, what's the west side really quickly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head to the west one and you go ahead and look inside, I imagine putting the spheres in as well? Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can feel my hair growing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's better. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've gotten most of the temple finished, and they haven't quite fully completed their work in going over the walls inside. The small chamber is maybe 15 by ten feet, and while there's no other real discerning shapes or details to it, you do see about ten feet ahead of you. It descends into stairs. Ten-foot wide set of stairs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any writing or anything in there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, but I think it keeps going down. I think they just never quite sealed it up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems like a pretty important entrance. I don't know why that would be last on their list.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're not expecting problems, and they don't seem that bright.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're not-- the warden can take care of itself?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I guess we'll take a quick look at north just to finish things off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make another perception check, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why is everyone yelling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This looks to be a sister hatchery room to the one on the south. This one does not contain a body, but just other clusters of eggs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it possible to tell if these eggs might hatch anytime soon, or are they that's left of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Let's do that. My nature is terrible, which is ironic. But I rolled a natural 20, so that should do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With what experience you have with seeing much smaller snakes and other type creatures in nature, you're not really fully understanding the gestation period of yuan-ti. These eggs don't look like they're ready to hatch in the next few days or so. There's still some time before the oldest clutches of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this true? Both look similar, both seem--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'd say so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's probably no direct danger leaving these things untouched for now. I think we've found a way down there, at the very least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We found our way into the room, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How big is the entrance into that little, unfinished--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the same five-inch tall, 12, 13 inches wide space.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do the tablets look to be on any hinges or levers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try reaching with my hands and pulling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make a strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (humming) No. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's wide enough. The actual stone tablets are maybe about three and a half, four inches long. You can get your fingers through and pull on the other side, but it does not budge. At all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it seem like it's separating from the rock, even a little, if I take a look at it from the side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aw, man. Low intelligence. That's a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It doesn't separate at all, but you do see each of the tablets. Where they're part of the wall, they're actually recessed in as opposed to placed against it. You can see, a very very faint gap where they would probably slide either side to side based on some mechanism.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, you think you can fit under that gap?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! Course I can! That's a vast cavern down there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) Which one are you going in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one are we near? Which one had the stairs going down? The stairwells?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the western one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make an acrobatics check, just to see if you can squeeze through the space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your small, goblin form has no real problem-- you have to rearrange your skull at a certain angle to make it through the gap, but you do manage to make your way through to the opposite side of the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you see?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Throw some light in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll be back in five minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No no, what do you see in the room, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. What? I don't know. What do I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the simple chamber. It looks like, at first, there was unfinished carvings in the wall, so it looks like the carvings come to a completion, and then the rest of it is a solid stone interior that stops at a wall on the opposite end about 15 feet in, and stairs that slowly curve down about ten-foot wide, just begin to go on a wide spiral downward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's some carvings, and there's a moving staircase.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you say moving?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think she said moving staircase, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not moving fast, it's just going back and forth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pressing face against the crack on. Do you see-- Jester wants to know if you see a switch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a lever, like a switch, or anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep trying, see if there's anything that connects to anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you need a globule or an owl?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there light or any keyholes or any switches or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm fascinated by the walls. I rolled a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So. Amongst the right hand carving, you look within one of the simple portions of a pillar or an obelisk as part of this carving that looks like a similar construct to the city that surrounds this temple, but the obelisk itself appears to protrude from a slight groove from behind this actual gap behind the obelisk, and you reach through and give it a tug. It pulls forward about an inch, at which point, the doors-- All three of the doors open at once, and the fountain raises up to close and return to where it was above.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. Didn't find any.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good job, Nott.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow. Wow wee wee wow wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't you hold Jester's hand and we'll see where these stairs lead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll grab a couple of the fruit that were on the ground and put them in my pocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fill a pocket with fruit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do the same.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you trying it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Same. I'm going to take some and put it in my bag again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You grab some fruit and put it in your bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take some for the road. Just to hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika isn't immediately visible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Nott immediately visible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jamedi, where'd your boss go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Congratulations. Shall we?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where were you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was inspecting the other chambers as they opened."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you find anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Snakes and a dead body. Huh?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's the dead body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's a corpse in the other chamber."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Rotted flesh and some bones."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You must know all about that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snaps fingers) You watch as this brief burst of flame (poof) in front.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is going to be so much fun!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. Captain, I feel like we are having all the fun ourselves. Perhaps you and your friend would like to take the lead this next round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was not part of the arrangement. You are proving your use to me as my companions and "part of my team. As the captain of the ship and as your superior, I tell you what to do, and you do it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we're not on the ship right now, though. Right? Hard to captain the ship when you're a hundred feet underground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, anything could happen right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So what, you kill me, then return and my entire crew just wipes you out as you arrive?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill you? My goodness, we were just trying to offer you a little bit of fun for this next stage. We had no problem--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I can read between the lines quite strongly there, Fjord. I appreciate that. Look, "this is not me trying to impose my will, just continue the arrangement we made. And I do not "feel like taking the lead. No. That is not the safest route for the captain, eh?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are you looking at me? Is she invisible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she's visible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you eat that fruit yet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wander over and see if there was a dead body in the other one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There's a dead body there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anything missing in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the body. Not much else in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does the body look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a decomposed corpse. Tattered clothing, broken leather belt, a simple satchel hangs open, just rotted and gone. It's been there for a long time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything in the satchel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and scoot down for a look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it look like-- like no way I could tell if she took anything from the satchel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She was the first to inspect the body. "So who is to make their descent? How about you, "Captain Tusktooth? Will you choose one of your subordinates to lead the fray into the "subterranean chambers?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think she's volunteering, huh?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. That's-- ugh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go, Beau! You're so cool! You should lead it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, let's go unleash the big snake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please find your way down. We'll be right behind you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tracy is my middle name. And I walk downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what's the marching order?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Phillip!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, he's talking to you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What, who? Who is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whistle) Over here. Eyes up. How big are those--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty big.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beauregard's in front.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been down here for days! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we should think about getting them some coffee or something? Before we have to go back down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's after Beauregard?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Jester's after Beauregard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somebody's dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put the high people in the middle, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so we'll put Caleb and Nott here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord and Yasha are the tallest. We put them-- perfect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll be in the very back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be in front of you, just so we have a cleric on either end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and Avantika is going to stay back with Fjord and Caduceus, and Yasha is going to be right in front of you guys. All righty. Are you descending quietly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you all to make a stealth check.
