lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do the stonies get disadvantage or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, I'm going to give you Blessing of the Trickster right in front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which gives me plus-- advantage? I will take it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need to drop acid all the time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for Yasha, if you don't mind as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Beau?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit! Yasha rolled a natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, thank god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys make your way quietly down the spiraling staircase that descends 20, 40, 60 feet before you see it begin to open into another chamber. Jamedi has the torchlight and stays back so as to not let any flickering light pollute into the next room. He gives a nudge into that direction, and you can see where the stairway continues to descend, but there's an area where the wall comes to an end. There's an open chamber lurking on the other side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is where the warden lives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continuing through, Jamedi's staying back, not wanting to show the torchlight. Who's going ahead to--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just peek around the corner with my goggles on to see if I see anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll show you what you see.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (sounds of awe)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Going into a battle high as fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got a brand new map, got a brand new map!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (imitates sounds of drums)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, D&D Beyond has partnered with Beadle & Grimm's to paint my face. Check it out! You get $50 off. Dndbeyond.com!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's that there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a symbol or shape!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a different wallpiece!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She doesn't see the other side of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a couple of other raised platforms in the chamber. Decorative or ceremonial, you're uncertain, but it is quiet, and what little movement that remains there is probably just the very faint ripples of the last bit of physical activity this creature had made amongst the surface of the two to three inches of water that fills the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The whole chamber is two to three inches?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what Beau can see, yes. The well is risen above it and the surface is still on the top of that well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caduceus, you were talking about some--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispered) Has it been more than ten minutes since the fight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since the fight? Oh yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispered) Okay, just checking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) You were talking about some poison resistance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's going to take it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Poison resistance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All I have are these.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Give it to Beau.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to cast Protection from Poison on Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. I also communicate--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Level two. You have advantage on saving throws against being poisoned, and you have resistance to poison damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. I also said: He has a shield and a scimitar. I don't know if we can get the shield away from him, but it'll make him easier to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it pitch-black in there, or is there a light source?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no light source.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks like he's asleep or praying, you said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It almost is like he's meditating, like I did that one time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What a good monk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. He's looking into the water, which makes me nervous about the water, because what could come out of it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispered) I feel like we should spring an attack on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't have to whisper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (normal voice) I feel like we should spring an attack on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll probably get one shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Can we get the shield away from him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's got one awesome shot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's your awesome shot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a little something we like to call--

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Fluffernutter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to say yes. I just don't know if now's the time to be demoing a new thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you pitch it to us in 30 seconds or less?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A quick pitch would be really good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have a one sheet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what? Fluffernutter sounds great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. I'm so high right now, but I know that that is not a good-- what is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (crossbow locking)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you holding?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pulling out the little keg of black powder that Nott stole from the pirate ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got my explosive arrow nocked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Starting to get a picture, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Couple quick thoughts. When we tried to blow up the tree, didn't work so well. Two load-bearing beams in a closed room with no windows, so it's going to hurt us too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fluffernutter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, the name is great. I'm just thinking maybe in practical use, not the best idea here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Think about this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am the only one doing that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're whispering all of this very quietly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you miss though, the ground is covered in water, so the powder will get really wet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold for just a second. Captain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have been an admirer of your ability to disappear. We could use that talent now if you thought you could get up close and strike without being detected. None of us--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could Fireball it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cannot do that right now. One, I have not prepared it. Two, I'm really messed up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you think you have the skill to pull off such a feat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why, but of course I can make myself or another invisible."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispered) Another person could be invisible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like you, with the keg.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispered) I could have the keg. Yeah, or I could be invisible, go in, and touch him and cast Inflict Wounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that pretty heavy duty?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It does a lot of damage if it hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it won't kill the thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to be danger close like that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's 5d10, and it's heavy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not enough!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She can potentially get a good--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (crossbow locking)

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've cocked this thing three times!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bolts are just popping off the end of it and onto the floor, just expending shells onto the floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could also summon Schmidt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is Schmidt?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's the invisible friend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To carry the keg over--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck the blackpowder keg.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord. Counterargument: (crossbow locking) (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a strong feeling the keg of blackpowder won't do that much damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It will deafen the creature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. Don't even know if it has ears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It might bring some rocks down from the ceiling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And kill us all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! It'll make a big puff of smoke. No one will be able to see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly-- Caduceus, fuck, balls! I'm sorry, it happens all the time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hurts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I apologize for this. I don't think it needs to see. I'm not even sure if it really-- do I know how snakes--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense from the fact that most of this temple is not lit at all, has no light source, they probably can see in the dark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It probably can see in the dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have eyes, not necessarily to see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not in smoke!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not how darkness works!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! We make a bunch of smoke, the thing is like, "I don't know what's going on!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Smoke still obscures in darkness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that we need to stay far away from this thing. I think we need to get its shield away from it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we're keeping our distance-- how many people are seriously considering fluffernutter? Show of hands. Can we put that to bed now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that's about 15 to 16 votes if my eyes don't deceive me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (British accent) Governor? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never been thinking clearer than right now! I see this working big time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could Invoke Duplicity in there and then Inflict Wounds with my duplicate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or carry the keg in with your duplicate and do both!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can't carry anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (growling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is the nastiest thing you have?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did not bring anything nasty like that. I came to be a team player today, like I always am. Captain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is it Philip, yes?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Philip. Do you have any ranged abilities as a sneaky one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can throw this," and she tosses the dagger and catches it. "But I am more of a up "close and personal eviscerator."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll duplicate in and Inflict Wounds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can she make your duplicate invisible?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can make my duplicate silent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anything that walks through there has to float above the water, or it's going to disturb it and alert--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a duplicate. It's not going to touch anything, really. It's a hologram, it's an illusion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, actually, I like that the best.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm into that, and someone should look at the dodecahedron.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We already did it today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you got it? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. We're going to send your duplicate to Inflict Wounds, float it up the water, don't disturb anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But Plan B!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh. Fluffernutter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, if any of us are in the room, no Fluffernutter, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (crossbow locking)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (tension releasing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like I'm talking to Baby Groot in Guardians 2. If we're in the room--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No button? Button!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fluffernutter?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fluffernutter?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. No fluffernutter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you more coherent than me so that you two can attack as one? Because I have seen you do a lot of damage when the enemy does not know you are coming. Could you go simultaneously?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At the same time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you watch her, and when her dupe goes, you go, and then--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so that he doesn't see it coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, there's so many of you right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can shoot at something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whatever you're doing, let's do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both of you, same time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we peek in without it seeing us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester and Nott, darkvision, silent as shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take off my explosive bolt and put on a reg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Given the circumstance, I would put Jester and Nott nearest to the top here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Behind Jester and Nott would be whom?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the purposes of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll be close to the front, too. I'll get nasty, I have darkvision. I mean, the second that water gets disturbed, it's going to be boy howdy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's at the back of that? Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me and Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Who's after them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wizard in the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say Avantika will be about there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wizard and cleric in the back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha can get behind Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi's staying back here with the group.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) My anaconda don't. My anaconda don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is the marching order as you guys are in the staircase.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I know if when I cast my duplicate, does it make a sound?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not make a sound. It is illusory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not a loser! It's really cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's not before we fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the plan? Who's going first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Simultaneous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to float your dupe across the water, and as soon as you say go, your dupe casts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or go around it, it doesn't have to go across the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but your dupe floats. We're assuming that the snake creature's asleep?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or meditating.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like it's got its eyes closed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From here, best you can tell, its eyes are closed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just float your dupe in, and when you say go, I'll shoot. I'm more than 30 feet away, so I think I shoot at disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to Invoke Duplicity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Invoke Duplicity. 30 feet away? That's where it appears.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. She can move up to 120 feet, so she's going to float silently and be on-- yeah, behind it so it doesn't see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Like right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Adjacent, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can shoot them at the same time. One, two, three, go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, both attack with advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Melee spell attacks. It's an ambush. It doesn't know you're there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait-- oh, she attacks with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, wait, got to look at my spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, 5d10.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money, no whammies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that's good.16 plus seven is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16 plus seven is 23?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 23, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. And you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm think I shoot at disadvantage because I'm longer than 30 feet away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So that's a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten misses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I bonus action? No, this is a single sneak attack action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool. (arrow whizzing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does the dupe count as an ally, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it does not. It has to occupy space for it to be an ally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get advantage on the attack if I'm hidden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right! So it should just be a single attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like that sound!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like it! I know, yeah, I'm into it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one you rolled?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The first one I rolled was a 12 plus eight is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would hit, so roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unload it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it is an ambush you get advantage on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 38. Is that just straight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Times two. 38 times two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it was a critical hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, isn't it because it's a sneak attack?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm thinking-- sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. You're thinking of a critical hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Critical hit. You're right, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. No worries. So the total is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 38 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 38 points of damage. That is not bad at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's. Fucking. Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Then--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled-- let's see here, sorry. I rolled a 15 and I will use-- because we short rested?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll also use Fury of the Small again. So that's 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fluffernutter would have totally obliterated it. We wouldn't have even had to fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please. You would have singed its scales.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 25 to 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. Okay-- nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nobody? 20 to 15?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yasha got to roll, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau, Nott, Fjord--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On what? What did you get? It was Nott--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau, Nott, Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord got what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then Caleb got a 14. Now it is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aww. What did Yasha get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, she got an eight also, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we won a slot machine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Although that will be good because if I go right before Yasha. That means that I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That means that if you guys have any creative ways to do combined attacks, the three of you can go at the same time and be fun with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that power of mine doesn't work as a big, simultaneous smush, it's just one attack, but I have to choose which attack that it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Well, essentially in that order you would be able to be like (spell attack) right before somebody hit if you wanted to. Because you're still on the same initiative order.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I still keep my reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That brings us to the top of the combat round. Beau, you're up first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (distressed humming) Fuck. Can I make it to the thing? Can I make it to him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to run all the way to the snake?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a monk. I've got fists!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (dramatic yelling) I'm a monk!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's all I've got. How far can I make it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you have 45 feet as your distance, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) That's one move. That'll get you about there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I come here? Kind of behind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And-- oops!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And throw a couple of shurikens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Try it out. It is 30 feet from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's exactly my range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is just plus my dex, right? Do I get my attack bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's a ranged--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. 18 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's better. That's a natural 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll damage for each.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. They're d4's, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: D4's, yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two d4's? The long debate of what's a monk weapon-- so five plus (counting)--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, hold on. If it's a monk weapon because it's the shuriken you got--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the darts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, but the darts. They're not monk weapons, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've gone back and forth about this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. The daggers or something akin to that would be a monk weapon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The debate rages on. Sorry. Five plus four which is nine plus another four which is 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 damage total?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right? Yeah, 13 damage total. Then I'm going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop. (giggles).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I want to do Patient Defense?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move five more feet there to get behind that pole if you want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And hold-- I still have a bonus action though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Patient Defense would be your bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nah, you know, I'm not going to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not going to do that? Then you still have a bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll throw one more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right? I can do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For your bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'll--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll double check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's probably right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Player's Handbook has vanished from me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? It should be right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Under the paper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's the Monster Manual, DM's guide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In your hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. While I'm looking this up, anything else--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An unarmed strike is a bonus action, so you cannot throw a third shuriken.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll just hold for now. I'll just hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold. All right. That's Beau's turn. Next up is Nott. Nott, you are up next.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! I'll go in to the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're on deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Into the left as far as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Five, ten, (counting).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I was just at 30. On the way, I'll fire another crossbow bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh. Not good. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Ey!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it engaged with Jester's dupe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not count as an adjacent ally, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boo. I rolled a six, though, so that's 11 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. Nice! As the three shurikens stick into its form (growling and hissing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sees you rush past and (growling).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As it strikes and maybe looks down to see where I got it, I'll bonus action hide behind the pillar. Okay. Ooh! 29 to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It looks (growling), it looks up (snorting) and can't quite track you. It does see Jester up in the stairway, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now its turn as the abomination takes its round. It is going to pull its scimitar out and rake it across the stone, carving sparks and grinding off some of them causing this echo throughout the chamber before resheathing it and pulling its longbow out and getting it out to fire a volley of two arrows at Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At me? But I could've hidden or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the longbow, you are in its first range. First attack is 18 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my armor class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, that does hit. You take 18 points of piercing damage as well as--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18 points?! From a bow shot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As well as 15 points of poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh. Wait, are you resistant to poison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the arrow (groaning), it's longer than an average arrow. This longbow is a longbow for one of these large abominations and it just sinks into you. It pulls back for another arrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. A second shot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good. It misses me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one you deflect it and the arrow splinters off and hits the wall. With that, it's going to move behind here and is now back to the wall and it's getting another arrow ready. That brings the end of his turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I will use my 30 feet of speed to run in the direction of Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't draw attention. Go away!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will cast Hunger of Hadar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (in deep voice) Hunger of Hadar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20-foot sphere, 20-foot diameter with the closest lip of it on the side of the well that's closest to us. Here, back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say there, there, there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that reach the creature?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hope so if it won't, I'll move it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're glancing your eye, it's where you looking at. Going to land wherever it lands, wherever you want to place it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thought there was a big circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20-foot radius? Yeah, that'll definitely be good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's good. Yeah, cover the well, cover him. Get everybody in, hopefully.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hell yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back there. Yeah, that's about right. The whole area fills with darkness, and these strange, somewhat translucent, slimy tendrils occasionally whip out the sides of this orb where light cannot pierce. That's your action and your movement, is that the end of your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Caleb. You're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to push forward through the passage and peek over Jester's shoulders. I can see this guy partially hidden behind-- it's too early. I give a tug to the glove of blasting and I am sending out three Scorching Rays.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We won't see anything into it, though, because it's just black.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it pitch black still? There's no--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's black.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come around the chamber and you look and all you see is a giant sphere of blackness. You have no idea where the creature is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pitch black? I have darkvision because of the transmutation stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's double check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "You open a gateway to the dark. 20-foot radius sphere of blackness and bitter cold."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's totally dark because of what you just did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No light, magical or otherwise, can illuminate the area, and creatures fully within "the area are blinded."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't see it at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could hold it in case something comes out of the sphere or the well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shit, I don't like this. Balls. I'm going to cast-- no, I don't know where it is at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you haven't seen it yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. What I am going to do is peek around the corner, and cast Haste on Beauregard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice. Useful. Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're hasted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are super fast!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit, fast. Super fast. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Super fly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Caleb's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will step out back into the passage so I'm not in view.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Yasha, Caduceus, and Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. I'm going to give you a quick pop since you could use a little bit of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Thank you, Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a quick Cure Wounds really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. d8 plus five, I believe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where are my d8s? That's not a d8. Ah, a d8. That's nine points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine! (music)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, my bonus actions, not a lot I can do with my bonus actions at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha's going to use her bonus action to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Double dash into this corner past Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, if she doesn't attack or be attacked, she loses her rage next round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's going double rush in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 30, 35, 40.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then double dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dash and she can get over on this side, you mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For my bonus action, I'm going to cast a Light spell on the other side of the wall really quickly so that we have some light in this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Just on one of the columns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Now the chamber, primarily, is now visible to everybody without issue, yourself included.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I'm going to take some cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it an action to cast Light as a cantrip?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's an action, never mind, can't do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you had cast Light previously on the edge of your staff. You're still giving off your own light source.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, well I'm going to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to stay put, then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull in the back and hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the back of the hallway there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, just around the corner so I can't get hit by a bow. I'm going to advise you do the same eventually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I was watching when he walked around the pillar, so I saw where he went.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send my duplicate backwards a few steps and hold out her hand and hope that she touches him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Back a few steps. Make an attack with disadvantage, if you're going to be doing something else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you doing another Inflict Wounds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At 3rd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, fuck me. It doesn't hit. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to release. Spell is expended, but no impact on the creature, unfortunately. 3rd-level spell used.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, sucks. Okay. That's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your dice look really good tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're really pretty, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, totally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and I'm going to move around the corner so that he can't fucking shoot arrows at me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back up here? All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crowded hallway. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a bunch of people waiting in line for the bathroom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (music)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just waiting for the other shoe to drop, here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've already done some damage. He's about to take more damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Start of the turn, got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. At the top of his turn. However, you guys both finish. Yasha did her turn. You're all done there, looks good. Now comes to Avantika and Jamedi. Avantika's going to charge down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) Into the fray! Do those tentacles attack good guys, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi is going to come forward and take the torch and throw it further inside. It clatters this way, helps illuminate that side of the chamber, and then backs up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not knowing how Hadar's works, it doesn't pierce that area, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. It lights everything around it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a bubble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round. The surface of the well begins to bubble and move. The water begins to rise up like the surface bubbles up and begins to pour on the side. As you watch this large, snake-like serpent head arrives. And another. And another. And another. You see emerging from the center of this chamber--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A hydra!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My god, what the fuck is that?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A hydra!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- the true guardian: the Warden. Spoken of in the text above.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's the False Serpent? If the Warden guards the False Serpent?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We haven't gotten to the False Serpent yet, this is the Warden!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the biggest thing I've ever seen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It definitely enters the Hunger of Hadar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We couldn't even kill the stupid little snake guy, how are we going to kill a hydra?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten points of cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of cold damage to the hydra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So stupid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Gotcha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you did get us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Speed is halved.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because of the Hadar's?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, Avantika's the one closest to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moves forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. No. Stop. Don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Has a reach of ten. Doesn't have to fully get into melee with her. It's going to take multiple attacks at her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't even see the heads come out, we just see the heads pop out of this bubble of blackness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see this body emerge from it. That is a natural one. Good for her. That misses. 16. That hits. That hits, and that hits. With that, Avantika takes 15 points of piercing damage. Ten points of piercing damage, and 11 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika, she's like, "Holy fucking shit! I could use some assistance!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Merde!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is just trying to fight these things off. All right, now it's Beau's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it end its turn in the sphere as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! So many d's.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine points of acid damage, if that makes any difference.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hydra is down to 500 hit points!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. It's burning and holding it in place, slowing it down, but it seems to neglect it for the most part.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't seem so great now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To Beau?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- Beau's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling) I'm going to attack it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With my fists!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Beau swings around, Hasted--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you flank it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at its current position.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, can I go around? Can I flank with Avantika? Or no? No, you got to be in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get into the pool, if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are you putting a thing on me?

lines.name: LIAM, MATT
lines.text: You're Hasted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's a good thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want to be? Here? Here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Speed is doubled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to come in and I'm going to do a big spinning barrel flip with two flying kicks! Crack, crack! Right onto its spinal cord. Sorry, Gil, you've been destroying me here lately. First two hits! Oh! Did you see that?! That was such shit! 14 for one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 just misses. Your staff just scrapes off of its hard armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, they both miss.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about your extra attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do that. I'm going to do more attack because of Haste!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get out of there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get out of there!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disengage and bolt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis, your face was just like-- That's the most amazing face you just made.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have a bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not going to get out of there!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get out of there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to stay there!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! Get out of there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember: Ten! 15! 11! Lots of points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're right, I'm going to back up and be like, this sucks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do? Don't listen to them, do what you were going to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I disengage as a bonus with Haste?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Disengage is an action, unless you're a rogue and had that ability.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I leave, I'm going to get hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take a bonus action to Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to try and tank this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was it three attacks from the hydra on Avantika or four?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could have left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It landed three. It got five attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One per head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Beau's turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus! Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is each head a creature, or is each head a--? Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a singular creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Step of the Wind. I could have disengaged as a bonus action, but I want to stay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure you can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Step of the Wind allows you to do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does, yeah, it does. But I'm going to stay. I don't want to do that, I want to stay and tank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I don't see eyes on the other thing, so I will step out and fire at one of those heads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Terrible. I don't have any sort of advantage, right? 11 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 to attack? Misses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Isn't it technically a sneak attack at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she doesn't know you're there, so it would be advantage since you were hidden previously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was hidden. 20 to hit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get sneak attack damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (counting) 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of damage to it. Strikes into it, one of the heads looks back into your direction, glancing around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (fearful yelp) I will shout out, Fluffernutter! I'm going to go back behind the pillar and hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back which way, to here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, and I'm hiding. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. That finishes your turn, Nott. It's now the abomination's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 2d6 cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 11 points of cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points, nice. Slithers out of the radius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sees Yasha and sees Avantika. Avantika's handled now by the hydra. He's going to now look towards Yasha and take two arrow strikes at her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At Yasha?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, the hydra? Or the thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the abomination right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Yasha raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she's not raging. That is an 18 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is her armor class.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought you did rage as a bonus action. Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 19 to hit. She takes six points of piercing damage and eight points of poison damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack is 13 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Yep. Good shit, good stuff. I'm going to (tongue clicking) move a little closer to the column and I'll send two arcs of Eldritch Blast towards the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're moving, you said?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just closer to Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, here. As you're moving in that direction (whooshing)-- this against the hydra?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so second one. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. The first one is 12, second one is nine, 18, 22 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of damage. As both bolts slam into the head, you watch as the head pops.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually blasts them off the hydra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No way, you can actually pop off a head!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like an idiot, I'll cast, with my bonus action, Hexblade's Curse on the hydra, which would have really made that critical way more awesome, but I'm flustered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But now you know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hexblade's Curse, right there. That brings us to Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, Gott. I'm going to lean around the corner and do what I thought I would do before, which is to tug on the Glove of Blasting and fire the three Scorching Rays. Natural 20 for the first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18 for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Very high for the third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll the first 2d6. Double this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35 points of damage. You watch as another head gets burnt to cinders. From the nearby impact, it actually cauterizes where the first head was destroyed and where the second one was destroyed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It needs burning damage or else it's (popping)..

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will jump back into the hallway because I'm a coward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fluffernutter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Caleb's turn. It is now Yasha, Caduceus and Jester's.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run out into the room. I want to run out. Can I see both of these creatures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this position, you cannot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How far would I have to go to see both of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm, you'd have to get this way and you don't have enough-- you could try and leap off here. You'd have to make an acrobatics check to see if you land properly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shit. I'll just see one of them, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This sphere is preventing you from seeing the abomination.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Bane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 16 charisma.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Charisma save? No, that is an eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, you know what Bane does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm looking it up again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can tell you. You have to roll a d4 for every attack or saving throw. You roll a d4 and you subtract that from what you get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You're concentrating on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't even think it is concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, concentration for up to one minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. That is Bane.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no 'C' on this thing. Oh, there it is. Never mind, I'm an idiot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that where you're staying?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm going to hide back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, pop back out. Healer tactics.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Caduceus's turn. Jester and Yasha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to move my duplicate outside of the tentacles, close to the shitty guy that I was fighting before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me just double check something as far as your duplicate is concerned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I have to keep a visual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It might be the case, it might not be. I'll double check here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is the case. I didn't think about the fact when it was in there that I don't have visual on it. I would have lost it before I ever cast that other spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got hit with 30 points of damage, too, so that's concentration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jesus. I don't know if works like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it just says, you create it for a minute, it says it's concentration, an unoccupied space, you can move the illusion for 30 feet in space you can see, but it must remain within 120 feet of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you cannot see any of these spaces where it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, can I move around the corner? Then see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Right now it's consumed in darkness. You cannot see anything past this. The Hunger of Hadar is blocking all your vision. You do not know where your illusion is, you just see this large sphere of darkness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't move it at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, cool. That was an awesome--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, would you have spent that spell? Would she have been able to spend that spell? If she couldn't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically no, but nevertheless.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nevertheless she did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it happens. I can't move my duplicate out of the darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To a space you can see, you can, but it would be over on this side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I move it over to Beau? Can I see that area, over next to Beau?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over next to Beau on this side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or just like in front of the well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get it right there on the cusp, floating above the top there. It's just peering out, and it's visible to you now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well at least it's out. I guess right now I'll just do, jesus christ, Guiding Bolt at 1st-level on the hydra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it! Roll for an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (music)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12 points of radiant and then next attack gets advantage on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I move out-- I move back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move back, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Smart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha got fucked up and does not care about Captain Avantika and will move 40 feet towards Nott and Fjord that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way? (counting)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great, and will hold a melee attack in case something comes within her range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that finishes Yasha's go. Top of the round. Now the hydra goes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 2d6 cold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hydra spins around to face Beau who has now moved up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine points of cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now only three functional heads, it's going to take three swipes at Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never used Bane. I should really start using Bane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) Double natural ones! That's impressive. Minus three!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Needed that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 12?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bane!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, more of that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 21.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With Bane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Bane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (coughing) Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 15 points of piercing damage as it suddenly-- two heads you manage to dodge by, there's one that was moving too quick that you didn't see coming and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your AC is two higher.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! You're right, my AC is two higher, what did you say? Oh, 21?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 21 is the AC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then it still hits you. Bites you in the side, lifts you off the ground from the impact and you feel the teeth crunch into your abdomen. You manage to elbow your way out and land, and you can see the fresh teeth marks starting to bleed down the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You doing okay?

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to move out and into range with both of them, right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shoot, the Captain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She didn't want an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not within range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's not? Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they have a reach of ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought she was right up. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's going to bring us to Beau. You're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First attack, I'll take that 13 and 14, plus seven so 19-- or, 20 and 21, you're right. With my first one I want to do a stunning strike to it. No-- yeah. First attack, stunning strike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a d4 negative also.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That lowers it to 16.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope! No, he saves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus five on his con.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus five on his con? That's great to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't you do something that makes it more vulnerable to its next hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah! Advantage, she gets advantage on the next hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll one more dice, just in case it's a crit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. It's not a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's definitely worse. With those two hits, I want to do extract aspects. I already know its con is plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gave you that to you as a freebie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's its wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus zero.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wisdom save is plus zero. He's not smart! Or wise, whatever. And if he has any-- do we want vulnerabilities or resistances?!

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Just do--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vulnerabilities! What's his vulnerabilities?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No vulnerability for the hydra.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural 16, pretty sure that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use my staff. That's terrible. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend another ki point and do flurry of blows and do two more hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One's an eight, so 15 for one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then the other is an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That misses. You have one more hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Terrible again. Six points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolling series of strikes, you pull some information from it. Manages to pummel the sides of this base where its torso is. Well done. Does that end your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No vulnerabilities. No, I'm not moving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you stay where you are. That brings us to Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nott the Brave yells to her teammates: The colors are so vivid! Then also: Everyone back up, we're going to Fluffernutter this bitch! I will (cocking crossbow) and hold my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your explosive bolt?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! Waiting for a keg to be thrown.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You're holding your action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a wasted action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cocking crossbow) Fluffernutter!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now the abomination's turn. The abomination-- or Avantika's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, the little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I feel like I forgot Avantika's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Avantika and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Jamedi. Avantika would have darted around and gotten into melee with the hydra.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't care about Avantika.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got the keg, right? Thank god, there's another checks and balances to that crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a-- (counting) 22 points of damage to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 22 points of damage to it?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, from Avantika.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck! From the two strikes to it? Her rapier, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishes her go. Jamedi is just shaking and not even getting involved in the combat. Too scared to go in. That brings us to the abomination's turn, who's going to turn around the corner, rise up on the platform here--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, wait. What's it doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fastball special.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was about to pee, but not-- did it move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a good thing, yeah, because it turned around and it's going to take two shots at you with its longbow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool, cool, cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're Patient Defense-ing, right? You're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, not this round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 15.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss. He's shooting at me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 23.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 23? I'm going to use deflect missiles and take that-- minus d10 to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of piercing damage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of it's negated by deflect missiles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Including 12 points of poison damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which you are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm resistant to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So you take six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I will go ahead-- My deflect-- I guess not, it's poison, it's not going to-- I'll still take that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it doesn't even catch you. No poison. You manage to stop it in place. The poison doesn't even hit your system.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to-- I'm going to not spend the ki point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watching you reach behind and catch the arrow and stop it from going there, and the second one just manages to dodge past you. (growling) It's going to go ahead and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at him and I take the arrow and go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's when you take the 2d6.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Resistance! (spitting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spitting it out on the side, your lips and tongue go a little numb. All right, that ends its go. Fjord, you're up and then Caleb you're on deck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use the 30 feet of Fjord's movement to go around the pillar, preserve this line of sight with the hydra. I'll unleash two Eldritch Blasts at it. That's an 18 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One. That's terrible. That's 13 points of Eldritch Blast energy. Oh, I'm sorry, wait. Just checking. Plus three, so 16 points, with the additional three. That will be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're concentrating on that. I forgot about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. I should have said it first. That's it, that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you add your extra damage for your Hexblade's Curse?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. That was the plus three to damage. I forgot to do something else. I'll do it next time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn, Fjord. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to do a little bit of a gamble here. I peek out again and I drop Haste on Beauregard and smear molasses across my hand and cast Slow on the hydra and his little snakey friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What'd you cast?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slow. They have to beat a 16. They've got Bane, or the hydra's got Bane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this would be concentration, regardless.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The abomination, that is a natural 12 plus two, that's a 14. What's your DC?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 16. The Bane's on hydra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the hydra--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a natural 18--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Fuck me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Minus three for the Bane. That's 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck you, hydra!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It gets one attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! That a fucker's, oh! Okay. Things can still go wrong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cad!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What else does Slow do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've dropped Haste on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've Slowed the hydra.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the other one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With a wisdom save?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It worked, yeah. With Caduceus' Bane we got it. It almost didn't make it, but with Bane it made it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That went well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Bane) Oh, hydra!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This ends Caleb's go. That brings us to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb's hiding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb moves off to the side. Yasha, Caduceus, and Jester?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jester, you first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can't use reactions!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No reactions, none of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I do it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, no, because, I mean-- (groans)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aim high!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott told me to do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cocking crossbow)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fluffernutter!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I throw it. But I throw it high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester steps out to the side. Throw it high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Towards the heads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (quietly) Don't roll a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up! Don't curse it! 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, roll an attack roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get any advantages?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're almost in sync here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. (laughing) The barrel (whooshing). The bolt (arrow firing) and detonates somewhere on the opposite side of the chamber as the barrel (landing) into the water of the well in the center there. You hear a splash of water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's good that we burned those two actions for that; I feel like that was a good use.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would've been spectacular if it had worked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would've been--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That didn't go as well as I had hoped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was about as disappointing--

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: (shouting) Fluffernutter!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you've ever had fluffernutter, that's about the flavor of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my bonus action, I'm going to move my duplicate out and stand next to Avantika.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can't really do anything because I used my action. She's just going to stare at Avantika.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hide around the corner and for my move, the rest of my movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yasha, are we--? I'm going to yell down to Yasha: I know what he's vulnerable to. I'm going peek out and cast my Path to the Grave before Yasha's turn on the hydra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's now vulnerable to everything. The next hit is double damage. It's what we did last time. Next hit is double damage, I'm back to hiding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now she would like to ragé.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just plow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is flanking with Avantika, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So auto-advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have to do reckless?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, you don't have to. You can if you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Divine thing on the first one. That's only a 14 on the first one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 misses. Goes wide, second strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 does hit. 15 was the threshold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay, it's still holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and she still does her divine damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the first one that hits, right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You still have it, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) 16 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another head is carved off of its body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now we have to burn the head with the-- aww, it would've been so great if we would've succeeded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would've been fucking amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cauterized all of the head wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Yasha's go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now Avantika's turn, Avantika is going to take three strikes at it. The rapier-- both hit, 18 and 11 naturally. The dagger misses with a four. Oh shit. (counting) 25 points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She can also back off without repercussions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam, we ended the last round, did Fluffernutter, we won.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points of damage from Avantika carves off another head. There is now one head on the hydra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to burn the heads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next up is Jamedi, who's staying out of the fray. Next is the hydra's turn. The hydra, who only has one head, but is slowed and can only make one attack anyway, is going to swing back to you since you're the one who looks the most damaged too and it wants to start taking something down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, against you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does Sentinel engage there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From Yasha, yeah, if it's attacking something else other than her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, that's a natural 20 against you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that a natural 20 against you? (counting) Oh. Can I see from my vantage or can I not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you specifically got out of sight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does Sentinel come after the attack or before the attack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It happens as it happens, so roll for Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's going to do it reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can't reckless out of turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I got you. Shit, I don't remember what it was when I picked it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Be level! It's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 just hits. Roll damage for Yasha. That's cocked. That is 18 points of piercing damage to you, Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 17 points of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. It's starting to look hurt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How are you feeling?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll let you know. Not great. Double digits, but barely, once again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that'll do. The problem is the fucker behind you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on a second. At the end of its turn-- ah! End of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn unless it's taken fire damage. Since it was slowed and did not take fire damage, it regrows four new heads.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four new heads?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can it do that because it can only do one action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just happens at the end of its roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, even the ones that were cauterized?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the cauterized ones are still gone, but the two that it lost last turn--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grew back as four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a hydra!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what a hydra is. I'm not a dork.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Greek mythology!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It makes a wisdom save against the Slow, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could do it like Hercules and just keep making it reproduce!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of its turn? Natural 17!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Minus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, right, yeah! This could do it! Minus one-- 16. What's the DC?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 16. "Each target must succeed on a wisdom saving throw or be affected by the spell for the duration."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of the spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not seeing that. I'm going to look in the book. I don't see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A creature affected by the spell makes another wisdom saving throw at the end of its "turn. On a successful save, the effect ends."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It just failed because of Bane, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, what's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It succeeds the save.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, with Bane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just rolled. It was a one on the d4. It brought it from 17 to 16. He succeeded. The Slow fails and it does regenerate some hit points from regaining the two heads back. All right. That ends the hydra's turn. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! Oh god. I see it grow more heads and I'm like: Cool, cool, cool. I'm going to reach up and I'm going to bash two of its heads together! Then do a little bit of speed bag action!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, isn't it flanked right now, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from Beau, it's not. Yasha and Avantika are flanking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First attack. Yep, that's good. 21!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use my staff for this main hand. That's-- cool. Five damage. Next attack: terrible. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 misses, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my two attacks. Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where is Avantika and Jamedi in the initiative order?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika and Jamedi are at the very bottom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At the very bottom, they were? They should probably go before Beau then, right? Because this is the beginning of a new round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She already went. She was the one who cut off one of the heads and then it came back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Terrible round. Done for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Patient Defense for Beau. That brings us to Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?! We just did Fluffernutter!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. It's still over there in the darkness somewhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is your dark spell still up so we can't see anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we can-- Oh, not on that side of things, but you see the other side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's where it went.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's wet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's wet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not wet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The keg is wet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean kegs that hold beer and wine and are completely waterproof?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless it cracked from throwing it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will stick my head out and shoot the hydra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for an attack. I was hoping Fluffernutter was going to work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 misses, it goes wide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! I'm hidden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are hidden! You have advantage on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 does hit, so roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah. I'm getting nervous. Got to admit, I'm getting nervous. I'm running out of cool shit to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (counting) Oh 23!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? Ooh, nice! All right. It takes the damage. It sinks into one of the necks. Its body is taking wounds heavily. It's hurt. It's not on the edge of its life, but it's hurt. That finishes Nott's turn. It's now the abomination's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action, I hide again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He is slowed still. So half speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. He is going to go ahead and-- can't take a reaction, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No reactions and it can only do an action or a bonus action, not both, and only one attack.

lines.name: MATT
