lines.text: Oh man. The only one close enough to do anything is Beau. It's going to sweep up behind Beau and take one giant swing with its scimitar at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's staying out of that bubble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage. Yes, staying just on the cusp of the bubble. Disadvantage because of Patient Defense. Which is good you did because its was a natural 20 and then a five. That brings it to 12. It totally misses. It swings wide. It would have been a head cleaving blow and out of the corner of your eye you see it with your Patient Defense ready and watch it slowly carve past, catching a couple hairs on the side of your head as you duck out of the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, slow-mo style. Fwoom. Ting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Touches up your undercut.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Ooh. Got a nice Erika Ishii zig-zag pattern now in my undercut.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. No, still slowed. Man! That fucks him up, too, bad. That ends his go. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus action, I'll cast Hex at the hydra, dropping the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dropping the Hunger of Hadar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The bubble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Now the chamber is visible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Now, I will fire two Eldritch Blasts at the hydra with Hex on top. That's only a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a natural 20. You said the first one hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? No. It misses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine. 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nein.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get it, F-jord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18 plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 22, thank you. Plus 1d6 for Hex. Four. So 26.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you double the Hex dice, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. 30. Total of 30.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you blow off another one of its heads.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blow that head!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Now it's down to four heads.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Travis loves blowing four heads!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Caleb leans up to throw some fire at-- Oh, fuck! Fucking-- He pulls out some more molasses and just does the same thing again: Slow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So much molasses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Slow again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many Slow slots do you have?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I only used one 3rd-level and I used it and got it back with the Arcane Recovery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you've cast Haste when you got in here and you cast Slow earlier, so that's two--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's two, so there's one more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So Slow. DC 16 with Bane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: DC 16 with Bane. For the abomination with Bane, that's 12 with him. So he fails.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fucked up. It was a natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I only cast it on the hydra, so the roll would have been for the hydra because the snake guy was still Slowed. So I wouldn't have cast it on the snake guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, you lose concentration on the-- When you recast a concentration spell, it drops before--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you say that I only give a fuck about the hydra and that I was aiming at the hydra? Because that's a hundred percent true. The hydra is the big target here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was Matt going to say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I understand, but Slow is an area effect meaning you can hit multiple enemies. There's no reason to not hit him. Otherwise, you lose the concentration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to look at the dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I don't want to look at the dice. You're the DM. Whatever you say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. That was--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's a natural 20, then the Bane doesn't even matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but then I rolled a four on the Bane, which brought it down to a 16. Which is exactly the DC. That's fucked up. That's why I laughed. I was like, "That's really stupid."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, the 20 is the only thing you can roll with a Bane that would definitely have no effect.

lines.name: MATT, LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, well, ducked back behind. It maintains basically where it was before. That finishes up your round, Caleb. Yasha, Caduceus, and Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Jester!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need a fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That doesn't quite-- it's not the same.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just light a torch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is radiant flame the same?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll find out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He seems on his last legs. He seems like a weiner dog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think you choose it, but it's a radius effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not radius! You can pick whoever you want. So if there were like six guys, I can say, "Those two guys," and not get the rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It still rolled a natural 20, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But if I only aimed at the hydra and didn't aim at the snake guy, that roll would have gone to the hydra. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To not be a stickler on--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's too nitpicky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just saying. There was no benefit to not choosing the snake guy because he would have lost his slow if you cast it on just the hydra and recasting it again, you can choose them both which means there was no benefit other than retroactively doing the die rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I assumed that it would carry over, but you're right. It drops and you start afresh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I It's okay. Now I understand how it works.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sucks when your high level spells fail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wizards are high-risk, high-reward for that reason. That brings us to Yasha, Caduceus, and Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha want to go first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can if you don't have anything you want to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. I'm going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to-- jeez, you're really hurt, aren't you, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not feeling great, but if you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It just seems like a waste. I feel like I should take out at least the other guy to lessen to the damage coming in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do you, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get that fucking bow and that bow is no joke. Those arrows are fucking--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is the wisdom thing that you did?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has plus zero to his wisdom saves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The hydra or the--

lines.name: MARISHA, MATT
lines.text: The hydra.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh? When did that happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know about the other guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Sacred Flame the other guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Wisdom save on him, natural 18.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no, he doesn't have fucking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Plus two, it's 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh no, that was a dex save. It doesn't matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what the fuck to do. I'm trying to get this guy out. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Jester's go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess. That's all I can fucking do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pop my head up and I think I'm going to back against the wall so that I can actually see what's going on for now because I'm starting to get nervous. I'm going to use my bonus action--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're putting your back against the wall here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Fuck, man. I'm also going to look at that undead motherfucker in the corner and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look at him and he's genuinely scared.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You found one of my buttons. I'm going to do a bonus action Healing Word on you. It's not a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (weakly) I'll take it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight points of healing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll so fucking take it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm using Path to the Grave one more time on the hydra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many times have you used it now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once and this is now my second because it resets after a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings us to Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. She will walk up and-- Do I even need to go reckless to get advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still flanking with Avantika.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing. Okay. That's good. That's 25 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that definitely hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) 18 points on the first one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that including the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 18 points doubled. So that becomes 36?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you also do the thing where the first hit of every--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The first hit on every hit gets the third d6.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Correct. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, another one of the heads is carved off, reducing this--

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: We need fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The second hit is a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hurting real bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two, eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Every time one of these heads comes back, does it gain hit points?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And also attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oof, that's not a good round. A two, a three, and 16 on the dagger. That hits, though. Five points of damage for Avantika.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! Avantika!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Let's get out of this! Shared survival!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jamedi is just going to stare back at you and be like, "I was not hired for this!" That brings us to the hydra's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to reply to that, do you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm curious if I buy his bullshit or not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make an insight check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, thank you. Ugh, ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hard to read. The hydra, now that it has, technically, advantage with the abomination across from you, Beau, it's going to take its attack--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That means it's a straight attack for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do the sentry on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool, cool, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 20 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, with negative d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. That would make it 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (strained) Miss!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18 misses you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, she's hard to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right, because you're Hasted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I got bracers and I'm just fast as fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 21 brought to 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that one hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19 against the hydra--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage for Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was 12 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh! That is 14 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To me? Yeah? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beau's low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 21.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even with the Bane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a 24. He's rolling really good this round.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 14 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau's down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was 12 against the hydra--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it. I'm out of healing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unconscious!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes the hydra's turn. The hydra now regrows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, and she's all by herself over there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are you, Beau?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're with Jester's clone, but you're between them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come here, buddy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have any fire in the bag of holding, either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's looking really rough, though. With Beau down, it's going to slither up over here and get into melee with you, Caduceus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No attack of opportunity because of sentry, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In which case, actually, it's going to slither even further up into getting with melee with Jester as well. Now the heads are curling down inside and it's making its way to up into the hallway. That ends the hydra's turn. Beau, I need you to roll a death saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lucky jade. Failure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First failed death save. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I see the keg?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (music)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shoot up-- kill the monster guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he can kill Beau-- he can do double damage right now to her if he hits her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but this guy is up there fucking your shit--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it. Kill the guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not in--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can kill her. Kill her kill her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill her kill her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (cooing) Kill him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're within talking range. You don't have to yell at--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Listen to Jester!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will peek around and fire at that guy, whatever that guy is. The abomination.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You scoot around the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Save me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's so close. He's still slowed and you watch him (groaning).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then shoot one more shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you grab the keg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh thank god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I live another day!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Onto the ground. You're just holding the keg there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm standing on the water holding my keg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends your turn, Nott. That would have been the abomination's turn, but he's dead. That brings us to Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Yes, I'll move just so I have a line of sight with the hydra and I'll rip off two Eldritch Blasts in its direction. That is 18 on the first one to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The second one is 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does not hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does not hit. Okay. 1d10 plus four. Nine, plus four is 13, plus-- 16 plus 1d6 for Hex. That's six points. 22 points of Eldritch Blast damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You undo its healing from last round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning it healed up 20 points and then you just did 22. You blast its body and part of its back muscles are exposed and bits of bone are showing. It still has all of these heads that are sinking forward and desperately biting around it, but it's looking really rough. That finishes your turn, Fjord. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh jeez, okay. I'm not within range of it, right? Because there's a tunnel here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, you were just out of its range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I killed it, you saw it. I'm backing up as far as I can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this curves around so you can get that close, but you can't see it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need to see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where you can see it. Any further and you're not going to be able to see it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Fire Bolt at one of its heads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. It has, technically, three-quarters cover because of most of it's covered by the rest of the chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if I stand next to Jester instead? And risk my life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's half cover.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half cover?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Next to Jester there will get you into its melee zone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine, that's what I'm doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's in the melee zone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that's regular and that is a 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on a second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you punching it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm using Fire B-- yes fucking Dragonballing that shit. Does the hydra have nads?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the hooligan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just letting you know, you have disadvantage on attacks when you're in melee with something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When I'm in melee with something? Well, I would know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's pretend like I knew that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's either get into melee and have disadvantage or take three-quarters cover.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's disadvantage no matter what. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well it's disadvantage or it gets plus five to its AC. Your call.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you get in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I got to roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The first was 21. The second was much worse! 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 misses. The bolt goes wide, arcing past it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not a good day for Caleb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you did so much already! So much! (farts) Sorry. I'd blame it on the chair if it wasn't trite.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm in range now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are in melee range, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you're staying there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I'm staying. If I run, it's going to hit me, so I'm just going stay put.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right that ends Caleb's turn. Yasha, Caduceus, and Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to go first? Actually I'll go first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, go, take it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I apparently have more 3rd-level spells than I thought, so that's exciting. I'm going to cast Spirit Guardians at level three. I just tap my staff and a bunch of creepy little glowing fairies start flying around me. That's a wisdom 16 save. Minus d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural 17.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just need a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A four. Fails. Actually no, technically--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Technically, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In casting Spirit Guardians, which is a concentration spell, your Bane drops. So it does succeed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so sorry, I wouldn't have dropped the Bane, then. I'm so sorry. I didn't see that it was concentration. That would have changed my plan--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, we'll just walk that back a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nobody's allowed to learn at the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Spirit Guardians is a concentration of ten minutes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. Did we figure out what the constitution of this creature was, by the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus five to con, plus zero to wis.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to do what I was going to do originally which is I'm going to do a level three Guiding Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay then. You are in its melee, so disadvantage on the attack roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guiding Bolt up its ass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up the butt!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please. What's the plus to this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever your spell attack modifier is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is my spell attack--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it's plus eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck! 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 misses, unfortunately. Guiding Bolt goes wide.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, man. Bonus action, I'm going to vanish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That means any attacks against you have disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to move two spaces over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two space over--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To my right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Inside the tunnel you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, right in front of Caleb. Just to get funky. Fuck man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn. Some bad rolls, you guys, I'm sorry. Jester.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's focused on us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, he's going to get a hit on us. I'm going to go down if I heal Beau, so I'm going to heal Beau and hope that somebody takes care of him before he kills us. I'm going to use my duplicate to reach down and touch Beau. Can I see my duplicate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to move forward to see it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'm already within range of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move there and glance up the side, if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see Beau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to reach down and use Cure Wounds at level one because that's what I've got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cure Wounds with-- yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With touch, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have this hydra miniature at home and when I get home, I'm going to go to my office and I'm going to throw him into the neighbors yard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yasha, please, Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The neighbor finds lots of minis in his yard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten points of healing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's the oni, the giant red dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Might as well get right up in there, I suppose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm awake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi Beau.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got to get better at this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give it a couple years.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a few more decades and you'll have mastered this game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm seeing things I should have done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all I've got.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the game.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No bonus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have anything to do for bonus, outside of Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do Patient Defense!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Yasha's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay! I've got something. Can I bring my duplicate up next to me? For my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, confusion technique.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is, he gets a negative-- he gets disadvantage on attack rolls against me when my duplicate's next to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Smart, smart, smart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's Yasha? She's going to walk up and swing away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Save us, Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there any advantage from flanking anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, no, because nobody is directly into melee with it, they're just within its reach.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm an idiot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25 to hit on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lie. I get on advantage on attacks, they don't have disadvantage on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15 on the second, does that hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 just hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 and there's nothing else. Yeah, 20 points on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and the next attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine points on the second-- I'm sorry, ten. Ten points on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How does Yasha want to do this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, isn't that her second how do you want to do this tonight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's so brutal!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's so strategic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As it rears back to strike, they see the Magician's Judge pierce through the belly of the hydra and cleave through the middle of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blade shinks out the front and then (squishing noises). With a violent swing, the torso splits apart with Yasha standing over the back and leaping off behind it where it falls and slides down the steps to the base of the bottom chamber,

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She just goes: No problem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was pretty good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking Swede.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the hydra slain and fallen, everyone looks around, taking a moment breathing heavily, taking in the much worse way that could have gone a few times.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One very important question-- Am I still high as balls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both Nott and Caleb are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll for balls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is some good shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That explains a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step out, you look down and see Avantika walking up and kicking the body and looking at the rest of you. There's sweat in her brow, little smear of her own blood down the front of her face. "Not bad. Not bad at all. You can stay on the crew."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool. Thanks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Puts her blades away. And that's where we're going to pick up next week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking Jamedi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had questions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I had some words for Jamedi in the middle of my drug high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck Matt, jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many heads did we go through? I think we went through-- I'm sure CritRoleStats knows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love the mini; it comes with so many heads.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it was around like 14 or 16 or something, I can't remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Man, I wanted that to explode so bad!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for not shooting it in the pool because that might have killed you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, Beau would have definitely died.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Beau would have taken an automatic death saving fail.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it would have been glorious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you had thrown it high enough, if you hit it, it would have just hit the hydra, but that low roll was just this low arc. It would have probably hit Beau and everything around it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So like, a medium range roll, like a 15,16, 17-- Hit the hydra, killed Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would have lived.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In essence with the low strength roll, it's probably best that you missed because it would have been--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would have been like a free Fireball, essentially.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the ballpark damage-ish? Like blank d6?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, you still can use it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll figure it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said we can still use it if it's not damaged.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Large groups of enemies, it's a great idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fluffernutter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to see the aftermath of this battle, explore this chamber, and what the things you've learned and hope to learn mean. Until we get to then, guys, we love you very much and is it Thursday yet? Good night.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Fluffernutter! [music]
